original: kṣetraṃ sukṛṣṇaṃ mṛdusaprasannaṃ jñeyaṃ sadā hyauṣadhasaṃgrahāya // 32 //

bhāva arthaḥ

original: svalpaṃ surūpaṃ surasaṃ sugaṃdhaṃ / mṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ pathyatamaṃ pavitram /

rogān nihaṃti āśu tadā ati ghorān hīna adhikam tad viphala ādi doṣam

original: mātrādhikaṃ hyauṣadhamatra dattaṃ / kuryādajīrṇaṃ viṣamāgnitāṃ ca // 36 //
analyzed: mātrā adhikam hi auṣadham atra dattam kuryāt ajīrṇam viṣama agni tām ca

hīnam tu akiṃcitkara tām upaiti tasmāt samam sādhu niyojanīyam
datvā alpam alpam divasa trayeṇa mātrām vidadhyāt iha doṣa śāṃtyai
bhāva arthaḥ

original: sarvāṇi sārdrāṇi varauṣadhāni vīryādhikānīti vadaṃti tajjñāḥ /
analyzed: sarvāṇi sārdrāṇi vara auṣadhāni vīrya adhikāni iti vadaṃti tad jñāḥ
sarpiḥ viḍaṃgāḥ saha pippalībhiḥ jīṇāḥ bhavanti uttama sadmuṇā āḍhyāḥ

original: sthūlaḥ kṛśo madhyamanāmakaśca tatra pradhānaṃ khalu madhyamākhyam // 39 //
analyzed: sthūlaḥ kṛśaḥ madhyama nāmakaḥ ca tatra pradhānam khalu madhyama ākhyam

bhāva arthaḥ
sthūlasya kārśyam karaṇīyam atra rūkṣya auṣadhaiḥ bhojana pānaka ādyaiḥ
snigdhaiḥ tathā puṣṭi karaiḥ kṛśasya pathyaiḥ sadā madhyama rakṣaṇam syāt
bhāva arthaḥ

original: doṣaiḥ svabhāvācca kṛśatvamuktaṃ doṣodbhavaṃ sādhyatamaṃ vadaṃti /
analyzed: doṣaiḥ svabhāvāt ca kṛśa tvam uktam doṣa udbhavam sādhyatamam vadaṃti

original: svābhāvikaṃ kṛcchratamaṃ nitāṃtaṃ yatnācca tadbṛṃhaṇameva kāryaṃ // 42 //
analyzed: svābhāvikam kṛcchratamam nitāṃtam yatnāt ca tat bṛṃhaṇam eva kāryam
bhāva arthaḥ

rūkṣaiḥ kaṣāyaiḥ kaṭu tikta vargaiḥ āhāra bhaiṣajya vidhānam iṣṭam
bhāva arthaḥ

original: kṣīṇasya pānīyamataḥ praśastaṃ / bhuktvottaraṃ kṣīramapīha deyam /
analyzed: kṣīṇasya pānīyam atas praśastam bhuktvā uttaram kṣīram api iha deyam
nasya avalehaiḥ kavalagrahaiḥ vā nityam tad agniḥ parirakṣaṇīyaḥ  /
bhāva arthaḥ

original: vāmyo vasaṃte sa ca madhyamākhyo varṣāsu bastiṃ vidadhīta tasya /
analyzed: vāmyaḥ vasaṃte sa ca madhyama ākhyaḥ varṣāsu vastim vidadhīta tasya

original: nityaṃ tathaikasya rasasya sevā / varjyāni doṣāvahakāraṇāni // 46 //
analyzed: nityam tathā ekasya rasasya sevā varjyāni doṣa āvaha kāraṇāni

original: dehakramaṃ sādhu nirūpya rogān vakṣyāmahe sūtravidhānamārgāt /
analyzed: deha kramam sādhu nirūpya rogān vakṣyāmahe sūtra vidhāna mārgāt

analyzed: vātaḥ kaphaḥ pittam iti pratītāḥ doṣāḥ śarīre khalu saṃbhavanti
bhāva arthaḥ

original: vātaḥ kaṭū rūkṣataraścalātmā pittaṃ dravaṃ tiktataroṣṇapītam /
analyzed: vātaḥ kaṭuḥ rūkṣataraḥ cala ātmā pittam dravam tiktatara uṣṇa pītam

original: snigdhaḥ kaphaḥ svāduraso'timaṃdaḥ svato guruḥ picchilaśītalaḥ syāt // 48 //
analyzed: snigdhaḥ kaphaḥ svādu rasaḥ uti maṃdaḥ svatas guruḥ picchila śītalaḥ syāt  /
bhāva arthaḥ

original: āmāśaye vakṣasi cottamāṃge kaṃṭhe / ca saṃdhiṣvakhileṣu samyak /
analyzed: āmāśaye vakṣasi ca uttamāṃge kaṃṭhe ca saṃdhiṣu akhileṣu samyak
sthitvā kaphaḥ sarva śarīra kāryam kuryāt sa saṃcāri marut vaśena
bhāva arthaḥ
pakvāśaya āmāśayayoḥ tu madhye hṛd vat kvacid prokta yakṛt plihāsu

original: pittaṃ sthitaṃ sarvaśarīrameva vyāpnoti vātātigameva nītam // 50 //
analyzed: pittam sthitam sarva śarīram eva vyāpnoti vāta atigam eva nītam
bhāva arthaḥ
śoṇī kaṭī vaṃkṣaṇa gupta deśe vāyuḥ sthitaḥ sarva śarīra sārī

original: doṣāṃśca dhātūn nayati svabhāvāt / duṣṭaḥ svayaṃ dūṣayatīha deham // 51 //
analyzed: doṣān ca dhātūn nayati svabhāvāt duṣṭaḥ svayam dūṣayati iha deham
bhāva arthaḥ

original: eko hi doṣaḥ kupitastu doṣān tāndūṣayatyātmanivāsasaṃsthān /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi doṣaḥ kupitaḥ tu doṣān tān dūṣayati ātma nivāsa saṃsthān
teṣām prakopān iha śāstra mārgāt vakṣāmahe vyādhi samudbhava arthān
bhāva arthaḥ
bāhya a taraṃga ātma nimitta yogāt karma udaya udīraṇa bhāvataḥ vā
kṣetra ādi aśeṣa ūru catuṣṭayāt vā doṣāḥ prakopa upaśamau vrajanti
bhāva arthaḥ
vyāyāmataḥ vā api ati maithunāt vā dūra adhva yānāt adhirohaṇāt vā
saṃdhāraṇāt svapna viparyayāt vā toya avagāhāt pavana abhighātāt
śyāmāka nīvāraka kodrava ādi durdhānya niṣpāva masūra māṣaiḥ
mudga āḍhakī tikta kaṣāya śuṣka śāka ādi rūkṣa ādi laghu prayogaiḥ
harṣa ati vāta ati hima prapātāt jṛṃbhāt kṣatāt vā ādi vighātanāt vā
rūkṣa anna pānaiḥ ati śītalaiḥ vā vātaḥ prakopaḥ samupaiti nityam
bhāva arthaḥ
śoka adhika krodha bhaya ati harṣāt tīvra upavāsāt ati maithunāt ca
kaṭu amla tīkṣṇa ati paṭu prayogāt saṃtāpibhiḥ sarṣapa taila miśraiḥ
piṇyāka taila ātapa śāka matsyaiḥ chāga avi go māṃsa kulattha yūṣaiḥ
tatra amla sauvīra surā vikāraiḥ pitta prakopaḥ bhavati iha jaṃtoḥ  /
bhāva arthaḥ
nityam divāsvapna tayā avyavāya avyāyāma yogāt uru picchila amlaiḥ
snigdha atigāḍha atipaṭu prayogaiḥ piṣṭa ikṣu dugdha adhika māṣa bhakṣyaiḥ
dadhnā āla
saṃdhānaka mṛṣṭa bhojyaiḥ vallī phalaiḥ adhyaśanaiḥ ajīrṇaiḥ
ati amla pānaiḥ ati śītalāḥ śleṣma prakopam samupaiti nṝṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
pratyeka saṃyoga samūha bhaṃgaiḥ puṃsaḥ
daśa eva atra bhavanti doṣāḥ
raktam ca doṣaiḥ saha saṃvibhājyam dhātuḥ tathā dūṣaka dūṣya bhāvāt
bhāva arthaḥ
teṣām prakopāt udare sa todaḥ saṃcārakaḥ sa amlaka dāha doṣāḥ
hṛllāsa tā arocaka tā ca doṣāḥ sa saṃkhyānataḥ lakṣaṇam ucyate itas
bhāva arthaḥ
saṃbheda uttāḍana todanāni saṃchedana unmathana sādanāni
vikṣepa nirdaṃśana bhaṃjanāni visphāṭana utpāṭana kaṃpanāni
viśleṣaṇa staṃbhana jaṃbhaṇāni niḥsva āsana ākuṃcana sāraṇāni
nānā ati duḥkhāni animittakāni vāta prakope khalu saṃbhavanti
bhāva arthaḥ
uṣma atiśoṣa ati vimoha dāha dhūmāyana arocaka roṣa ātāpāḥ
deha ūṣma tā sveda bahu pralāpāḥ pitta agra kope prabhavanti rogāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
supta tva kaṃḍū guru gātra tā ati śveta tva śīta tva maha tva nidrāḥ
saṃstaṃbhaka arocaka tā alpa ruj ca śleṣma prakopa upagata āmayāḥ te
bhāva arthaḥ
eṣām bhasma ati rūkṣaḥ prakaṭatara kapota ati kṛṣṇaḥ marut syāt
pittam nīla ati pītam haritatamam atīva asitam raktam uktam

original: śleṣmā snigdhātipāṇḍuḥ sa bhavati sakalaiḥ saṃnipātaḥ savarṇaiḥ /
analyzed: śleṣmā snigdha ati pāṇḍuḥ sa bhavati sakalaiḥ saṃnipātaḥ sa varṇaiḥ

original: doṣāṇāṃ kopakāle prabhavati sahasā varṇabhedo narāṇam // 67 //
analyzed: doṣāṇām kopa kāle prabhavati sahasā varṇa bhedaḥ

t kartavyam tasya yatnāt urutara guṇavat bheṣajānām vidhānam

vaidyena udyukta karma pravaṇa paṭu guṇena adārāt āturāṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
iti jina vaktra nirgata su śāstra mahā aṃbunidheḥ

nisṛtam idam hi śīkara nibham jagat eka hitam

yaḥ vā vā iti akhilam trikāla caritam trailokya garbha sthitam

original: natvā taṃ parameśvaraṃ jitaripuṃ devādhidevaṃ jinam /
analyzed: natvā tam parameśvaram jita ripum deva adhidevam jinam
vakṣyāmi ādarataḥ krama āgatam idam kāla kramam sūtrataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
kālaḥ
yam bhūta anusaṃkālanāt
saṃkhyānāt aguruḥ na ca ati laghuḥ api ādi aṃta hīnaḥ mahān
sūkṣmaḥ vibhāgī punar
saḥ ayam syāt samayaḥ upi amūrta guṇavān āvartanā lakṣaṇaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
saḥ yam syāt vividhaḥ unumāna viṣayaḥ
loka ākāśa samasta deśa nicitaḥ upi ekaikaḥ eva aṇukaḥ
kālaḥ iti iṃdriya gocaraḥ paramaḥ iti evam pratītaḥ sadā
tad pūrvaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti abhihitaḥ sūrya udaya ādi kramāt
bhāva arthaḥ
saṃkhyā atīta tayā pratīta sama
yā syāt āvalī iti smṛtā
saṃkhyāta āvalikāḥ tathā evam uditāḥ sa ucchvāsa saṃjñā anvitāḥ
sapta ucchvāsa gaṇaḥ bhavati atitarām
tokāt sapta lavaḥ bhavet vasu yutāt triṃśat lavāt nāḍikā
bhāva arthaḥ
nāḍyau dve ca muhūrtam iti abhihitam triṃśat muhūrtāt dinam
pakṣaḥ syāt daśa pacam ca eva divasāḥ tau śukla kṛṣṇau samau

original: māsādvādaśa ṣaḍca te ṛtugaṇāḥ caitrādikeṣu kramāt /
analyzed: māsāḥ dvādaśa ṣaṭ ca te ṛtu gaṇāḥ caitra ādikeṣu kramāt
dve ca eva api ayane tayoḥ militayoḥ yarṣam hi saṃjñā kṛtā
bhāva arthaḥ

original: liye jitanā samaya letā hai utane kālako eka samaya kahate haiṃ /
analyzed: liye jitanā samaya letā hai utane kālako eka samaya kahate haiṃ
ādyaḥ syāt madhuḥ urjitaḥ śuciḥ iha api aṃbhodhara aḍaṃbaraḥ
yāthāsaṃkhya vidhānataḥ pratipadam caitra ādi māsa dvayam
nityam syāt ṛtuḥ iti ayam hi abhihitaḥ sarva kriyā sādhanaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
pūrvāṇhe tu vasaṃta nāma samayaḥ madhyaṃdinam grīṣmakaḥ
prāvṛṣyam hi aparāṇham iti abhihitam varṣā āgamaḥ prāk niśā
madhyam naktam udāhṛtam śarad iti pratyūṣa kālaḥ
nityam vatsara vat kramāt pratidinam ṣaṇṇām ṛtunām gatiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
śleṣmā kupyati sat vasaṃta samaye hemaṃta kāla arjitaḥ

analyzed: prāvṛṣi eva hi mārutaḥ pratidinam grīṣme sadā saṃcitaḥ
pittam tat śaradi
teṣām saṃcaya kopa lakṣaṇa vidheḥ doṣān tadā nirharet
bhāva arthaḥ
viśeṣa
kruddhāḥ te prasaranti rakta sahitāḥ doṣāḥ tathā ekaikaśas

original: dvaudvau vāpyathavā trayastraya ime catvāra evātra vā /
analyzed: dvau dvau vā api athavā trayaḥ trayaḥ ime catvāraḥ eva atra vā

original: te vyādhiṃ janayaṃti kālavaśagāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ yathoktaṃ balam // 9 //
analyzed: te vyādhim janayanti kāla vaśa gāḥ ṣaṇṇām yathā uktam balam

original: yo vā vetti samastadoṣacaritaṃ duḥkhapradaṃ prāṇinām /
analyzed: yaḥ vā vetti samasta doṣa caritam duḥkha pradam prāṇinām
saḥ yam syāt bhiṣaj uttamaḥ pratidinam ṣaṇṇām prakuryāt kriyām

evam kāla vidhānam uktam adhunā jñātvā atra vaidyaḥ mahān

original: bhojyaṃ pānamapīha tatsamaguṇaṃ proktaṃ tathā coṣakam //
analyzed: bhojyam pānam api iha tat sama guṇam proktam tathā coṣakam

nasyam sat vamanam ca pūjyatamam iti evam jineṃdra uditam
bhāva arthaḥ
grīṣme kṣīra ghṛta prabhūtam aśanam śreṣṭham tathā śītalam

original: pānaṃ mānyaguḍekṣubhakṣaṇamapi prāptaṃ hi kaupaṃ jalaṃ //

dugdha ikṣu prakara ādikam hita karam peyam jalam yat śritam
bhāva arthaḥ
sa kṣīram ghṛta śarkarā āḍhyam aśanam tiktam kaṣāya anvitam

original: sarvaṃ syātsalilaṃ hitaṃ śaradi tacchreyo'rthināṃ prāṇināṃ /
analyzed: sarvam syāt salilam hitam śaradi tat śreyaḥ ūrthinām prāṇinām
hemaṃte kaṭu tikta śītam ahitam kṣāram kaṣāya ādikam

bhāva arthaḥ

bhāva arthaḥ

original: viṇmūtre ca vinirgate vicalite vāyau śarīre laghau /
analyzed: viṣ mūtre ca vinirgate vicalite vāyau śarīre laghau

original: snigdhaṃ yanmadhuraṃ ca pūrvamaśanaṃ bhuṃjīta bhuktikrame /

bhāva arthaḥ
nmartyaḥ tu odanam eva ca abhyavaharan tad krānta anupāna anvitaḥ

original: snehānāmapi coṣṇato yadamalaṃ piṣṭasya śītaṃ jalaṃ
analyzed: snehānām api ca uṣṇataḥ yat amalam piṣṭasya śītam jalam

original: pītvā nityasukhī bhavatyanugataṃ pānaṃ hitaṃ prāṇinām // 18 //
analyzed: pītvā nitya sukhī bhavati anugatam pānam hitam prāṇinām
bhāva arthaḥ
prāgbhaktāt iha pītam āvahati tat kārśyam jalam sarvadā

original: madhye madhyamatāṃ tanoti nitarāṃ prāṃte tathā bṛṃhaṇam //
analyzed: madhye madhyama tām tanoti nitarām prāṃte tathā bṛṃhaṇam
jñātvā sa dravam eva bhojana vidhim kuryāt manuṣyaḥ anyathā
bhuktam śuṣkam ajīrṇa tām upagatam bādhā karam dehinām
bhāva arthaḥ
śālīnām madhura tva śītala guṇāḥ pāke laghu tvāt tathā
pitta ghnāḥ kapha varddhanāḥ pratidinam sṛṣṭa ati mūtrāḥ tu te
proktāḥ vrīhi guṇāḥ kaṣāya madhurāḥ pitta anila ghnāḥ tatas
nityam vaddha purīṣa lakṣaṇa yutāḥ pāke guru tva anvitāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
uṣṇāḥ rūkṣatarāḥ kaṣāya madhurāḥ pāke laghu tva adhikāḥ
śleṣma ghnāḥ pavana ati pitta jananāḥ viṣṭaṃbhinaḥ sarvadā
śyāmāka ādi kudhānya lakṣaṇam idam proktam nṛṇām aśnatām
samyak vaidala śāka sadrava gaṇeṣu ati ādarāt ucyate
bhāva arthaḥ
rūkṣāḥ śati guṇāḥ kaṣāya madhurāḥ sāṃgrāhikāḥ vātalāḥ
sarve vaidalakāḥ kaṣāya sahitāḥ pitta asṛji prastutāḥ
uktāḥ sa uṣṇa kulutthakāḥ kapha marut vyādhi praṇāśāḥ tu te
bhāva arthaḥ

r vidheyam adhika unmada ādi bahu mānasa vyādhiṣu

original: samastadehe'pi gadā bhavaṃti tāḥ prakīrṇarūpāḥ bahulāḥ masūrikāḥ // 37 //

bhāva arthaḥ
sa pīta rakta asita varṇa nirṇayāḥ jvara ati tṛṣṇā paritāpa tāpitāḥ
bhavanti mṛdvyaḥ bahulāḥ masūrikāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
kaphāt ghana sthūlatara ati śītalāḥ cira prapākāḥ śiśira jvara anvitāḥ
pravāla raktāḥ bahu rakta saṃbhavāḥ samasta doṣaiḥ akhila ugra vedanāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
śarāva vat nimna mukhāḥ sa karṇikāḥ vidagdha vat maṇḍala maṇḍitāḥ ca yāḥ
ghana ati rakta asita vaktra vistṛtāḥ jvara atisāra udgata śūla saṃkulāḥ
vidāha kaṃpā ati rujā atisāraka ati arocaka ādhmāna tṛṣā ati hikkayā
bhavanti asādhyāḥ kathitaiḥ upadravaiḥ upadrutāḥ śvāsa sa kāsa niṣṭhuraiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
vicārya pūrva udgata lakṣaṇeṣu alam vilaṃghana anantaram eva vā āmamet
sa niṃba yaṣṭhī madhuka ambuṣu varam trivṛt tathā udyat sitayā virecayet
bhāva arthaḥ
samudga yūṣaiḥ api ṣaṣṭhikā odanam sa tikta śākaiḥ madhuraiḥ ca bhojayet
su śītala dravya vipakva śītalām pibet yavāgūm athavā ghṛta plutām
bhāva arthaḥ

original: suśītalaṃ vā ś{??}rṛtaśītalaṃ jalaṃ pibettṛṣārto manujastadudgame /

sa śarkarā kiṃśuka śālmāli druma pravāla mūlaiḥ payasā anupeṣitaiḥ
pralepayet ūṣma nivāraṇāya tad rujā praśāṃtyai madhuraiḥ tathā aparaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
sa śaivala uśīra kaśeru kāśa sat kuśa aṃghribhiḥ sa ikṣu rasaiḥ ca lepayet
masūrikāḥ taiḥ viṣa jāḥ ca yāḥ yathā viṣa ghna bhaiṣajya gaṇauḥ viśeṣa kṛt
vidvān iti pāṭhātaram
bhāva arthaḥ
sa niṃba sāra amṛta caṃdana ambudaiḥ vipakva toyam prapibet sa śarkaram
aruṣka rāṃmra aṃbu sa dhānyarohiṇī ghanaiḥ śrṛtam śīta kaṣāyam eva vā
pibet sadā sphoṭa masūrikā apaham sa śarkaram sa ikṣu rasam viśeṣa vid
bhāva arthaḥ
vipacyamānāsu masūrikāsu tāḥ pralepayet vāta kapha utthitāḥ bhiṣak
samastam aṃdha auṣadha sādhitena sat tila udbhavena ājya gaṇaiḥ tathā aparaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
vipāka kāle laghu ca amla bhojanam niyujya samyak paripākam āgatām
vibhidya tīkṣṇaiḥ iha kaṃṭakaiḥ śubhaiḥ su cakra tailena niṣecayet bhiṣak
bhāva arthaḥ
vipāka pāka vraṇa pīḍitāsu api prasādhayet tāḥ kṣata vat visarpa vat
ajasram āsrāva yutāḥ prapīḍayet muhur muhur māṣa yava pralepanaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
su bhasma cūrṇena vigālitena vā vikīrya samyak pariśoṣayet budhaḥ
kadācid udyat krimi bhakṣitāḥ ca tāḥ krimi ghna bhaiṣajya gaṇaiḥ upācaret
bhāva arthaḥ
aśoka niṃba āmra kadaṃba pallavaiḥ samaṃtataḥ saṃtatam eva vījayet
sudhūpayet vā guḍa sarja sat rasaiḥ sa guggulu dhyātmaka kuṣṭha caṃdanaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
jalaiḥ abhikṣālya tilaiḥ su peśitaiḥ bṛhat tad ūṣma praśamāya śāstra vid
bhāva arthaḥ
masūrī mudga pravara āḍhakī gaṇaiḥ ghṛta anvitaiḥ yūṣa khalaiḥ phala amlakaiḥ
saḥ eka vāram laghu bhojana krama krameṇa saṃbhojanam eva bhojayet  /
bhāva arthaḥ
vraṇa kriyām sādhu niyujya sādhayet upadravān api anurūpa sādhanaiḥ
ghṛta anuliptam śayane ca śāyayet su carma padma utpala patra saṃvṛte
bhāva arthaḥ
sa saṃdhi śophāsu api śopha vat vidhim vidhāya patraiḥ dhamanaiḥ ca baṃdhayet
vipakvam api āśu vidārya sādhayet yathā ukta nāḍīvraṇa vat vicakṣaṇaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
drumaiḥ latābhiḥ ca suśīta saurabhaiḥ sadā vilimpet sa ghṛtaiḥ sa śarkaraiḥ

payaḥ nighṛṣṭaiḥ tila caṃdanaiḥ api pralepayet gavya ghṛta anumiśritaiḥ

bhāva arthaḥ
tatas sumatra kṣara rakṣitaḥ svayam cikitsakaḥ māri gaṇān nivārayet

original: vyaṃtarā bhuvi vasaṃti saṃtataṃ pīḍayaṃtyapi narānsamāyayā /

stanya ruṣ salila cakṣuḥ alpataḥ yaḥ śiśuḥ kaṭhina muṣṭi varcasaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
sa grahaḥ bahuvidhaiḥ kumāra vat tam kumāra caritaiḥ upācaret
kinnara ardita śiśum viśāradaḥ rakta mālya carukaiḥ upācaret
bhāva arthaḥ
bhyaṃga dhāvanam iha praśasyate putrake
bhāva arthaḥ
kādanī ghṛta guḍaiḥ ca dhūpayet snāpayet niśi divā ca catvare
bhāva arthaḥ

bhāva arthaḥ
vedanābhiḥ iha mūrchitaḥ śiśuḥ cetayati api muhur karān vribhiḥ
nṛtyati iva visṛjati alam malam mūtram api ati vinamya jṛṃbhayan  /
phenam udvamati bhīṣaṇaḥ hi apasmārakiṃpuraṣa nāmakaḥ grahaḥ
tam śirīṣa surasaiḥ sa bilvakaiḥ snāpayet iha vipakva vāribhiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

go vṛṣasya manujasya loma keśaiḥ nakhaiḥ kari pateḥ dhṛta plutaiḥ

bhāva arthaḥ

srasta gātra śiśuḥ eṣa sarvatas saṃbibheti garuḍa graha ārtitaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
āmra niṃba kadalī kapittha jaṃbūdruma kvathita śīta vāribhiḥ
snāpayet atha ca tat vipakvam taila pralepanam api praśasyate
bhāva arthaḥ
yat vraṇeṣu kathitam cikitsitam yat ghṛtam puruṣa nāmaka grahe
yat ca rakṣaṇa su dhūpana ādikam tat hitam śakuni pīḍite śiśau
bhāva arthaḥ
pāṇḍu rogam ati lohita ānanam pīta mūtra malam utkaṭa jvaram
śyāma deham athavā anya rogiṇam ghrāṇa karṇam asakṛt pramāthinam
bhāva arthaḥ
tam śiśum bhrukuṭi revatī sugaṃdharva vaṃśa viṣama graha ārtitam
bhyaṃjayet akhila sārasa drumaiḥ pakvasarpiḥ iti pāyayet śiśum
bhāva arthaḥ
dhūpayet api ca saṃdhyayoḥ sadā gṛdhra kauśika purīṣa saḍh ghṛtaiḥ
dhārayet varaṇa niṃba jām tvacām revatī graha nivāraṇīm śiśum
bhāva arthaḥ
luḥ bhavati adhika kāka gaṃdhavān pūtanā graha gṛhīta putrakaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
pāribhadra varaṇa arka nīlikā āsphota pakva salilaiḥ niṣecayet
bhāva arthaḥ
aṣṭa mṛṣṭa gaṇa yaṣṭikā tugā siddha sarpiḥ api pāyayet śiśum
bhāva arthaḥ
snāpayet api śiśum sadā eva sa ucchiṣṭa bhojana jalaiḥ vidhāna vid
śūnya veśmani rahasi anāvṛte nitkurūṭa nikaṭe
bhāva arthaḥ
caṃdana aguru tamālapatra tālīsa kuṣṭha khadiraiḥ ghṛta anvitaiḥ
keśa roma nakha mānupa asthibhiḥ dhūpayet api śiśum dvi saṃdhyayoḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
citra bīja sita sarṣapa iṃṅgudīm dhārayet api ca kākavallikām
sthāpayet balim iha utkurūṭa madhye sadā kṛśaram arcitam śiśoḥ  /
bhāva arthaḥ
kka abhirartita śiśuḥ vasā amla gaṃdha utkaṭaḥ vigata varṇa ca svaraḥ
tam vicārya kathita anupūtanā nāma yakṣa viṣama graha arditam
tikta vṛkṣa dala pakva vāribhiḥ snāpayet adhika maṃtra maṃtritaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
pippalī dvika biśiṣṭa mṛṣṭa vargaiḥ vipakva ghṛtam eva pāyayet
bhāva arthaḥ
keśa kukkuṭa purīṣa carma sarpa tvacaḥ ghṛta yutāḥ sudhūpayet

original: dhārayedapi sakukkuṭīmanatāṃ ca biṃbalatayā śiśuṃ sadā // 98 //
analyzed: dhārayet api sa kukkuṭīm anatām ca biṃba latayā śiśum sadā
bhāva arthaḥ
pūrta bhakṣya bahu bhojana ādikān sannivedya satatam supūjayet
snāpayet api śiśum gṛha aṃtare varṇakaiḥ viracita ujvale pure
bhāva arthaḥ
śīta vepita tanuḥ divāniśam roditi svapiti ca ati kuṃcitaḥ
sāṃtra kūjam atisārya visra gandhiḥ śiśuḥ bhavati śītaka arditaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
tam kapi thasu rasa āmra bilva bhallātakaiḥ kvathita vāribhiḥ sadā
mūtravarga suradāru sarvagaṃdhaiḥ vipakva tila jam pralepayet
bhāva arthaḥ

original: māhiṣeṇa payasā vipakvasarpiḥ śiśuṃ pratidinaṃ prapāyayet // 102 //
analyzed: māhiṣeṇa payasā vipakva sarpiḥ śiśum pratidinam prapāyayet  /
bhāva arthaḥ
śiśum atra biṃva guṃjā sa kāka latayā sa dhārayet
bhāva arthaḥ
mudga yūṣa yuta bhojana ādikaiḥ arcayet api śiśum jalāśraye
snāpayet adhika maṃtra maṃtritaiḥ maṃtra vid vidhi vipakva vāribhiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
śoṣavat su rucira ānanaḥ śiśuḥ kṣīyate iti bahu bhuj sirā tataḥ
komala aṃghri tala pāṇi pallavaḥ mūtra gaṃdhī api piśāca pīḍitaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
tam kubera nayana arka vaṃśa gaṃdharvahasta nṛpa bilva vāribhiḥ
san niṣicya pavana ghna bheṣajaiḥ pakva tailam anulepayet śiśum
bhāva arthaḥ
pāyayet api vacaḥ sa kuṣṭa sarjaiḥ śiśum satatam eva dhūpayet
bhāva arthaḥ
cāṣa gṛdhra sa mayūra pakṣa sarpa tvacā viracitāḥ ca dhārayet

original: varṇapūrakabalaṃ ca goṣṭhamadhye śiśo snapanamatra dāpayet // 108 //
analyzed: varṇapūraka balam ca goṣṭha madhye śiśoḥ snapanam atra dāpayet
bhāva arthaḥ
phenam udvamati jṛṃbhate ca sa udvegam ūrdhvam avalokate rudan
putrakaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
kāṃjika amla dadhi takra miśritaiḥ pakva tailam anulepanam śiśoḥ
vāta roga hara bheṣajaiḥ sumṛṣtaiḥ ca dugdha sahitaiḥ ghṛtam pacet  /
bhāva arthaḥ
dhārayet api śiśum harītakī gaurasarṣapa vacā jaṭā anvitā
mālya bhakṣya tila taṇḍulaiḥ śubhaiḥ arcayet iha śiśum vanaspatau
bhāva arthaḥ
snāpayet asura pīḍitam śiśum kṣīravṛkṣa nikaṭe vicakṣaṇaḥ
jaina śāsana viśeṣa devatā rakṣaṇaiḥ api ca rakṣayet sadā
bhāva arthaḥ
vyaṃtarāḥ ca bhavana adhivāsinā uṣṭa prakāra vibhava upalakṣitāḥ
bālam aśubha graha arditam spaṣṭa mṛṣṭa bali tuṣṭa cetasaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
yatra paṃca parameṣṭhi maṃtra sat maṃtrita ātma kavacān nara uttamān
pīḍayanti na ca tān graha upasarga āmaya agni viṣa śastra saṃbhramāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
mānuṣaiḥ saha vasaṃti saṃtatam vyaṃtara uraga gaṇāḥ vikurvaṇaiḥ
te bhavanti nija lakṣaṇa īkṣitāḥ aṣṭa bheda daśa bheda bheditāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
tad prayukta parivāra kiṃnarāḥ mānuṣān abhiviśaṃti māyayā
bhinna śūnya gṛha vāsinaḥ uśucīn akṣatān kṣaya yutān adharmiṇaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
manu jānataḥ narāḥ tad sva rūṣa kṛta veṣa bhūṣaṇāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
guru deva bhaktimān gaṃdha puṣpa nirataḥ su puṣṭimān

original: bhāsvarānimiṣalocano naro na svapityapi ca devapīḍitaḥ // 119 //
analyzed: bhāsvara animiṣa locanaḥ naraḥ na svapiti api ca deva pīḍitaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
niṃdati iha guru devatāḥ svayam vakra dṛṣṭiḥ abhayaḥ abhimānavān
svedana ati paruṣaḥ na tṛptimān īdṛś eṣa puruṣa usura arditaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
krīḍati iha vana rāji ramya harmya ucca śaila pulineṣu hṛṣṭavān
gaṃdha puṣpa parimālikāḥ ca gaṃdharva juṣṭa puruṣaḥ bhivāṃchati
bhāva arthaḥ
tāmra vaktra tanu pāda locanaḥ yāti śīghram ati dhīra satvavān
prarthitaḥ sa vara daḥ mahā dyutiḥ yakṣa pīḍita naraḥ sadā bhavet
bhāva arthaḥ
tarpayati api pitṝn nivā apadāna ādibhiḥ jalam api pradāsyati
pāyasa ikṣu guḍa māṃsa lolupaḥ duṣṭa bhūta pitṛ pīḍitaḥ naraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
sva lajjayā
varjita ūti balavān niśācaraḥ śopha ruj bhavati rākṣasaḥ naraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
dhūsara uti paruṣaḥ khara svaraḥ śauca hīna caritaḥ pralāpavān
bhinna śūnya gṛha vāsa lolupaḥ syāt piśāca parivāritaḥ naraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: sarpavatsarati yo mahītale sṛkkamoṣṭhamapi leḍhi jihvayā /
analyzed: sarpa vat sarati yaḥ mahī tale sṛkkam oṣṭham api leḍhi jihvayā
kupyati iha paripīḍitaḥ payaḥ pāyasa īpsuḥ uraga graha ākulaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
devāḥ te paurṇamāsyām asura paricarāḥ saṃdhyayoḥ saṃcaraṃti
prāyaḥ uṣṭamyām viśeṣāt abhihita guṇa gaṃdharva bhṛtya anubhṛtyāḥ

original: yakṣā maṃkṣu kṣipaṃti pratipāda pitṛbhūtāni kṛṣṇākhyapakṣe /
analyzed: yakṣāḥ kṣipaṃti kṛṣṇa ākhya pakṣe
rātrau rakṣāṃsi sākṣāt bhaya kṛti dina bhūḥ te piśācāḥ viśaṃti
rjñātvā satya dayā dama ādika guṇaḥ sarvajña bhaktaḥ svayam
sādhyān sādhayatu sva maṃtra balavat bhaiṣajya yogaiḥ bhiṣak

original: knūrāḥ kaṣṭatarā grahā nigaditāḥ kṛcchrāstu bālagrahāḥ // 128 //
analyzed: knūrāḥ kaṣṭatarāḥ grahāḥ nigaditāḥ kṛcchrāḥ tu bālagrahāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
graha āmaya ati adbhuta divya rūpāḥ nānā viśeṣa ākṛti veṣa bhūtāḥ
manuṣya dehāt niviśaṃti aciṃtyāḥ kopāt sva śaktyā api adhikurvate te
bhāva arthaḥ
tān sādhayet ugra tapaḥ viśeṣaiḥ dhyanaiḥ sa maṃtra auṣadha asiddha yogaiḥ
teṣām asaṃkhyāta mahāgrahāṇām śāṃti artham ittham kathayaṃti saṃtaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
yama niyama dama udyat satya śauca adhivāsaḥ
bhiṣaj adhika su maṃtraiḥ māṃtrita ātmā sva maṃtraiḥ
sṛta mala bali dhūpaiḥ sādhayet tān graha ākhyān
bhāva arthaḥ
tālī tamāla dala sāla palāśa pārī
bhadra iṅgudī madhuka sāra karaṃja yugmaiḥ
gaṃdha aśma tālaka śilā sita sarṣapa ādyai
rvi āghrī arka siṃha vṛ
kaśalya biḍāla viḍbhiḥ
daṃṣṭrā viṣāṇa śakṛtām sama bhāga yuktaiḥ
kvāthaiḥ vipakva ghṛta tailam iha prayojyam
bhāva arthaḥ
vṛṣaḥ iti pāṭha aṃtaram
abhyaṃjana sya nayana aṃjana pānakeṣu
sarpiḥ purāṇam api tat paripakvam āhuḥ
snānam ca tad kvathita bheṣaja siddha toyaiḥ
dhūpam vilepanam atha kṛta cūrṇa kalkaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
iti kathita viśeṣa aśeṣa sat bheṣajaiḥ tata
sadṛśa virasa bībhatsa ati durgaṃdha jātaiḥ
rbhiṣaj akhila vikārān mānasān āśu jeyāt
bhāva arthaḥ
iti jina vaktra nirgata su śāstra mahā aṃbunidheḥ
sakala padārtha vistṛta taraṃga kula ākulataḥ
nisṛtam idam hi śīkara nibham jagat eka hitam
bhāva arthaḥ
tridaśa nara uraga arcita pada amburuham vara dam
śaśi dhavalam jineśam abhivaṃdya viṣa apaharam
viṣama viṣa adhikāra viṣaya eka kathā kriyate
bhāva arthaḥ
nṛpatiḥ aśeṣa maṃtra viṣa taṃtra vidam bhiṣajam
kula jam a lolupam kuśalam uttama dharma dhanam
catur upadhā viśuddham adhikam dhana baṃdhu yutam
vidhivat amum vidhāya parirakṣitum ātma tanum
bhāva arthaḥ
sa ca kurute sva rājyam ādhikam sukha bhāj su ciram
sva para samasta cakra ripu cakrikayā janitam
vividha viṣa upasargam apahṛtya mahātma tayā
bhāva arthaḥ
bhiṣaj api buddhimān viśada tad viṣa lakṣaṇa vid
sukṛta mahānasa ādiṣu parīkṣita sarva janaḥ
vacana kṛta iṃgitaiḥ samabhivīkṣya caret acirāt
bhāva arthaḥ
hasati sa jalpati kṣitim iha ālikhati pracuram
vigatam an ācchinatti tṛṇakāṣṭama kāraṇataḥ
bhaya cakitaḥ vilokayati pṛṣṭam iha ātma gatam
na lapati ca uttaram virasa varṇa vihīna mukham
gbiṣadam apohya sa annam akhilam viṣa juṣṭam api
ravi tatha lakṣaṇaiḥ samavabudhya yateta ciram
bhāva arthaḥ
upagata sat viṣeṣu kathayāmi yathākramatas
vividha viśeṣa bhojana gaṇeṣu apareṣu bhṛtam
pi akhila viṣa prabheda viṣa vega vidhim ca tatas
bhāva arthaḥ
prayānti bahu vāyasa paddhatayaḥ
hutabhuji tabhdṛśam naṭanaṭāyati datta maram
śikhi gala nīla varṇam ati dussaha dhūma yutam
bhāva arthaḥ
bhramati sa nāsikā hṛdaya pīḍanam api adhikam
kara dhṛtam annam āśu nakha śātana dāha karam
mukha gatam aśma vat ca kurute rasanām sa rujām
bhāva arthaḥ
hṛdaya gatam tu praseka bahu mohana dāha rujam
vamana mahā atisāra jaḍa tā adhika pūraṇa tām
udara gatam karoti viṣam iṃdriya saṃbhrama tām
drava gata lakṣaṇāni kathayāmi yathāgamataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
viṣa yuta sa draveṣu bahu varṇa bicitrataram
bhavati su lakṣaṇam vividha budbuda phena yutam
yat api ca mudga māṣa tuvarī gaṇa pakva rase
su rucira rekhayā viracitam bahu nīlikayā
bhāva arthaḥ
viṣam api madya toya mudgata kālikayā
vilulita rekhayā prakurute nija lakṣaṇa tām
dadhi gatam alpa pīta sahitam prabhayā sitayā
su rucira tāmrayā payasi takra gatam ca tathā
bhāva arthaḥ
punar api tad draveṣu patitam pratibiṃbam iha

original: dvitayamathānyedava vikṛtaṃ na ca paśyati vā //
analyzed: vikṛtam na ca paśyati vā
dvi rasa vikīrṇa paryuṣita vat ca bhavet acirāt
bhāva arthaḥ
viṣa yuta danta kāṣṭham aviśīrṇa vikūrca yutam
bhavati tatas mukha śvayathuḥ ugra vipāka rujaḥ
tat iva tadā avalekha mukha vāsa gaṇe pi nṛṇām
sphuṭita masūrikā prabhṛtiḥ api anulepanataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
bahis akhila aṃga yogya vara vastuṣu tadvat iha
prakaṭa kaṣāya toya vasana ādiṣu śopha rujaḥ
saṃbhavanti mālya biṣeṇa nṛṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
mukuṭa śiraḥ balekhana gaṇeṣu api mālyam iva
pravidita lakṣaṇaiḥ samupalakṣayitavyam iha
avadaraṇa ati śopha bahu pāda guru tva rujā
viṣa yuta pādukā ādi apakṛtāḥ ca bhaveyuḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
nana kapha saṃsravaḥ ca nija dhātuḥ iha uru yuge
guda vṛṣaṇa dhvajeṣu
vivara mukheṣu
bhāva arthaḥ
vikṛtira
rviṣa vahula aṃjanena bhavati prabala āṃdhyam api
nyatividahanti arūṃṣi api bhavanti tad āśrayataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: idriyoṃmeṃ vikṛti nasya va dhūmaprayoga se hotī hai / kyoṃ ki aṃjana ke prayogase kevala āṃkhomeṃ
analyzed: idriyoṃmeṃ vikṛti nasya va dhūma prayoga se hotī hai kyoṃ ki añjana prayoga kevala āṃkhomeṃ

original: vikāra utpanna hotā hai anya iṃdriyo meṃ nahīṃ / graṃthāṃtara meṃ bhī likhā hai /
analyzed: vikāra utpanna hotā hai anya iṃdriya meṃ nahīṃ graṃtha aṃtara meṃ bhī likhā hai
nasya dhūma gate liṃgam iṃdriyāṇām tu vaikṛtam
viṣam abhivīkṣya tad kṣaṇa virāga vilocana tā
bhavati cakoranā
ma vihagaḥ ca tathā mriyate
punar api jīvanijīvakaḥ iti kṣitim ullikhati
rauti sahasā eva mayūra varaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
iti viṣa saṃprayukta bahu vastuṣu tad viṣa tām
prabala vidāha daraṇa śvayathu prakaraiḥ
viṣam avagamya nasya nayana aṃjana pāna yutaiḥ
viṣam upasaṃharet vamanam atra vireka gaṇaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
kṣitipatiḥ ātma dakṣiṇa kare paribaṃdhya viṣam
kṣapayati mūṣikā
jaruhām api ca anna
gatam
hṛdayam iha abhirakṣitu manāḥ sa pibat prathamam

original: mṛga pakṣiyoṃse bhī viṣa kī parīkṣā kījātī hai / isaliye rājāvoṃ ko aise prāṇiyoṃ ko
analyzed: mṛga pakṣiyoṃse bhī viṣa kī parīkṣā kījātī hai isaliye rājāvoṃ ko aise prāṇiyoṃ ko

original: raso+ī ghara ke nikaṭa rakhanā cāhithe /
analyzed: rasoī ghara ke nikaṭa rakhanā cāhithe

original: mudrikāmiti pāṭhāṃtaraṃ / isa pāṭhake anusāra aneka auṣadhiyoṃse saṃskṛta va vighnavināśaka
analyzed: mudrikām iti pāṭha aṃtaram isa pāṭhake anusāra aneka auṣadhiyoṃse saṃskṛta va vighna vināśaka

original: ratnoparatnoṃ se saṃyukta aṃgūṭhī ko pahinanā cāhiye / ślokameṃ
analyzed: ratna uparatnoṃ se saṃyukta aṃgūṭhī ko pahinanā cāhiye śloka meṃ
paribaṃdhya
evaṃ
graṃthātaraḥ mem bhī

original: mūṣikā kā pāṭha hone se usī ko rakkhā gayā hai /
analyzed: mūṣikā kā pāṭha hone se usī ko rakkhā gayā hai
cānta gatam iti pāṭha aṃtaram
bhāva arthaḥ
trikaṭuka cūrṇa saṃskṛta ghṛtam pravilihya punar
nṛpatiḥ aśaṃkayā sa garam api abhinīta maram
sa rasa rasa anna pānam avagṛhya sukhī bhavati
bhāva arthaḥ
atha viṣa bheda lakṣaṇa cikitsitam api ākhilam
vividha bikalpa jālam upasaṃhṛtam āgamataḥ
su vidita vastu vistaram iha alpa vacaḥ vibhavaiḥ
katipaya sat pathaiḥ nigaditam pravadāmi vidām
bhāva arthaḥ
trividham iha uditam jagati vastu samastam idam
nija guṇa yukta poṣaka vighātaka na ubhayatas
di akhilam apāpa hetuḥ iti poṣakam ātma hitam
bhāva arthaḥ
viṣa madhu madya māṃsa nikara ādi ati pāpa karam
bhava bhava ghātakaḥ bhavati tat ca vighāta karam
manu bhaya kāriṇaḥ bhuvi bhaveyuḥ abhakṣa gaṇāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
naya vinaya ādi upeta caritaḥ api vinaṣṭa manāḥ
vicarāti sarvam ālapati kāryam akāryam api
svasṛ duhitṛṣu mātṛṣu ca kāma vaśāt ramate
śucim aśucim sadā harati madya madāt manujaḥ
atha iha madya pānam ati pāpa vikāra karam
paruṣatara āmaya eka nilayam nara lāghava kṛt
ru bhaya bhava artha ghātakam anartha nimittam iti
bhāva arthaḥ
iti kathiteṣu teṣu viṣameṣu mayā āgamataḥ
pṛthak avagṛhya lakṣaṇa guṇaiḥ saha vidhīyate
trividha vikalpitam vana ja jaṃgama kṛtrimataḥ
sakalam iha upasaṃhṛta vacobhiḥ aśeṣa hitam
bhāva arthaḥ
sthira viṣam atra tat daśavidham bhavati iti matam
su vimala mūla pallava su puṣpa phala prakaraiḥ
radhika su dhātubhiḥ bahuvidha ukta su kanda gaṇaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
prabhṛti viṣam bhavet amala mūlataḥ eva sadā
viṣa dalikā karaṃbha sahitāni ca patra viṣam
kanaka sa tuṃbika ādi phala patra su puṣpa viṣam
bhāva arthaḥ
viṣam iha sāra niryasana carma ca cilla
jala haritāla gaṃdhaka śilā ādi urudhātu viṣam
pṛthak atha vakṣyate tadanu kaṃda viṣam viṣamam
bhāva arthaḥ
billaḥ iti pāṭha aṃtaram
cchvasana vijṛṃbha veṣṭana guṇāḥ api patra viṣāt
jaṭhara guru tva moha vamanāni ca puṣpa viṣāt
phala viṣa toru cirvṛṣaṇa śopha vidāha yutam
bhāva arthaḥ
tvac amala sāra niryasana varga viṣaiḥ ca tathā
śirasi rujā ānana ati paruṣa āṃdhya kapha ulvaṇa tā
guru rasana ati phena vamana ati vireka yutam
bhavati viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iha akhila dugdha viṣe  /
bhāva arthaḥ
dadhi kṛta dhātu jeṣu nikhileṣu viṣeṣu nṛṇām
atha kathitāni tāni viṣamāṇi viṣāṇi
puruṣam akāle eva sahasā kṣapayaṃti bhṛśam
bhāva arthaḥ
kaṃda jāni viṣamāṇi viṣāṇi jñāpayāmi nija lakṣaṇa bhedaiḥ
mustayā sahitam api aparam ca
rāṭaka ugra viṣam api ati ghoram vīra śāsana vaśāt avagamya
tat trayodaśavidham viṣam ukta lakṣaṇaiḥ samadhigamya cikitset
sparśa hāniḥ ati vepathuḥ udyat kālakūṭa viṣa lakṣaṇam etat  /
bhāva arthaḥ
utpatati aṭati ca ati hasati anyān aśati adhika karkaṭakena
kardamena nayana dvaya pīta sa atisāra paritāpanam uktam
bhāva arthaḥ
sarṣapeṇa bahu vāta vikāra ādhmāna śūla piṭakāḥ prabhavaḥ syāt
pīta netra mala mūtra karam tad vatsanābham ati niścala kaṃṭham
bhāva arthaḥ
mūlakena vamana adhika hikkā gātra mokṣa viṣama īkṣaṇa tā syāt
rakta locana mahodara tā tat puṇḍarīka viṣama ati viṣeṇa
bhāva arthaḥ
graṃthi janma hṛdaye pi ati śūlam saṃbhavet iha mahā viṣa doṣāt
saṃbhayā atra bahu sādana jaṃghā ūru udara ādi adhika śopha vivṛddhiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
staṃbhita ati guru kaṃpita gātraḥ mustayā hata tanuḥ manujaḥ syāt

original: bhrāmataḥ śvasiti muhyati nā hālāhalena vigatākhilaceṣṭaiḥ // 43 //
analyzed: bhrāmataḥ śvasiti muhyati nā hālāhalena vigata akhila ceṣṭaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
kena tadvat ati duḥkha tanuḥ vairāṭakena hṛta vihala dṛṣṭiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
prokta lakṣaṇa viṣāṇi ati tīvrāṇi ugra vīrya sahitāni ahitāni
ghnaṃti tāni daśabhiḥ sva guṇaiḥ yuktāni martyam acirāt adhikāni
bhāva arthaḥ
rūkṣam uṣṇam ati tīkṣṇam atha āśu vyāpi apāki laghu ca ugra vikarṣi
sūkṣmam eva viśadam viṣam etat mārayet daśa guṇa anvitam āśu
bhāva arthaḥ
rūkṣataḥ unilam iha uṣṇa tayā tat kopayati api ca pittam atha asram
sūkṣmataḥ sarati sarva śarīram
bhāva arthaḥ
vyāpakāt akhila deham iha āpnoti āśu kāraka tayā āśu nihaṃti
tad vikārṣi guṇataḥ adhika dhātūn viśet viśada tvāt
bhāva arthaḥ
laṃghanāt iha nivartayitum tat nā eva śakyam atipāki guṇa tvāt
kleśayati api na śodhitam etat viśvam āśu śamayet viṣam ugram
bhāva arthaḥ
śīrṇa jīrṇam anala aśani pāta ati ātapa ati hima vṛṣṭi vighṛṣṭam
tat viṣam taruṇam ugra viṣa ghnaiḥ āhatam bhavati dūṣiviṣa ākhyam
bhāva arthaḥ
nmādam anyat atisāram idam dūṣīviṣam prakurute jaṭharam ca
dhmānam anyat api tat kurute śukla kṣayam bahuvidha ugra vikārān
bhāva arthaḥ
sthāvara ugra viṣa vegaḥ idānīm ucyate prathama vega viśeṣe
stabdha kṛṣṇa rasanā sa bhayam mūrcchā ca
bhāva arthaḥ
vepathuḥ gala rujā atividāha sveda jṛṃbhaṇa tṛṣā udara śūlāḥ
te dvitīya viṣa vega kṛtāḥ syuḥ sāṃtra kūjanam api prabalam ca
bhāva arthaḥ
āma śūla gala tālu viśoṣa ucchūna pīta timira akṣi yugam ca
te tṛtīya viṣa vega viśeṣāt saṃbhavaṃti akhila kaṃda viṣeṣu
bhāva arthaḥ
sāṃtra kūjanam atha udara śūlāḥ hikkayā ca śirasā uti guru tvam
tad caturtha viṣa vega vikārāḥ prāṇinām ati viṣa prabhavāḥ te
bhāva arthaḥ
parva bheda kapha saṃsrava vaivarṇyam bhavet adhika pacama vege
sarva doṣa viṣamaḥ api atisāraḥ śūla moha sahitaḥ khalu ṣaṣṭe
bhāva arthaḥ
skaṃdha pṛṣṭa calana adhika bhaṃṅga aśva asra rodhe iti saptama vege
tam nirokṣya viṣa vema vidhi jñaḥ śīghram eva śamayet viṣam ugram
bhāva arthaḥ
vāmayet prathama vega viṣa ārtam śīta toya pariṣikta śarīram
pāyayet hdṛta yuta agadam eva śodhayet ubhayatas dvitaye ca
bhāva arthaḥ
nasyam aṃjanam atha agada pānam tad tṛtīya viṣa vega viśeṣe
sarva muktam agadam ghṛta hīnam yojayet kathita vegacaturthe
bhāva arthaḥ
paṃcame madhura bheṣaja niryūṣa anvita agadam atha api ca ṣaṣṭe
yojayet tad atisāra cikitsām nasyam aṃjanam ati prabalam ca
bhāva arthaḥ
tīkṣṇam aṃjanam atha api avapīḍam kārayet śirasi kākapadam vā
saptame viṣa kṛta adhika vege nirviṣīkaraṇam anyat aśeṣam
bhāva arthaḥ
pīluka amṛta latā sa śirīṣaiḥ pācitam ghṛtamaram gara hārī
bhāva arthaḥ
ṣṭhā priyaṃgu sa viḍaṃga sunīlī sārivā tagara pūtikaraṃjaiḥ
pakva sarpiḥ akhila ugra viṣa āri tam niṣevya jayati iha viṣāṇi
pāna nasya nayana aṃjana lepān yojayayet aghṛta vareṇa narāṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
candana uru rucaka amṛtavalī elāḥ sucūrṇya sita gavya ghṛtābhyām
durviṣam viṣama dāha tṛṣā tīvra jvara prabhṛti sarva vikārān
bhāva arthaḥ
jaṃgama ākhya viṣam api ati ghoram procyate tadanu ṣoḍaśa bhedam
dṛṣṭi niśvasita tīkṣṇa su daṃṣṭra lāla mūtra mala śukra nakhāni
vāta pitta guda bhāga nija asthi sparśa daṃśa mu
kha śūka śavāni
ṣoḍaśa prakaṭitāni viṣāṇi prāṇinām asuharāṇi aśubhāni
bhāva arthaḥ
sitaḥ iti pāṭha aṃtaram
dṛṣṭi niśvasita tīvra viṣāḥ te divya rūpa bhujagāḥ bhuvi jātā
daṃṣṭriṇa uśva khara vānara duṣṭa śvānada aśva
daśana ugra viṣa āḍhyāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
śiṃśumāra makara ādi catuṣpāda pratīta bahu dehi gaṇāḥ te
danta paṃkti nakha tīvra viṣa ugra abheka varga gṛha kokilakāḥ ca
bhāva arthaḥ
ye sarīsṛpa gaṇa agaṇitāḥ te mūtra viṣ daśana tībra viṣa āḍhyāḥ
mūṣakāḥ bahuvidhāḥ viṣa śukrāḥ vṛścikāḥ ca viṣa lāla mala ugrāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
ye vicitra tanabaḥ bahu pādāḥ sparśa daṃśa pavana ātma guda ugrāḥ
daṃśataḥ kuṇabha varga jalūkāḥ mārayanti mukha tīvra viṣeṇa
bhāva arthaḥ

original: sthīni tāni kathitāni viṣāṇyeṣāṃ ca pittamapi tīvraviṣaṃ syāt // 74 //
analyzed: sthīni tāni kathitāni viṣāṇi eṣām ca pittam api tīvra viṣam syāt
bhāva arthaḥ
makṣikāḥ sa maśakāḥ bhramara ādyāḥ śūka saṃnihita tīvra viṣāḥ te
yāni aciṃtya bahu kīṭa śarīrāṇi eva tāni śava rūpa viṣāṇi
bhāva arthaḥ
jaṃgameṣu api viṣeṣu viśeṣa prokta lakṣaṇa guṇāḥ daśa bhedāḥ
saṃti adhas khila śarīra ja doṣān kopayaṃti adhika sarva viṣāṇi
bhāva arthaḥ
tatra jaṃgama viṣeṣu ati tīvrā sarpa jātiḥ iha paṃcavidhā asau
bhoginaḥ atha bahu maṇḍalinaḥ rājī virājita śarīra yutāḥ ca
tatra ye vyatikara prabhavāḥ te vaikaraṃja nija nāma viśeṣāḥ
nirviṣāḥ śuka śaśi pratimā ābhāḥ toya tad samaya ja ajagara ādyāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
dṛṣṭi niśvasita tīvra viṣāṇām tad prasādhana kara auṣadha vargaiḥ
kā kathā viṣama tīkṣṇa su daṃṣṭrābhiḥ daśanti manujān uragāḥ ye
teṣu daṃśa viṣa vega viśeṣa ātmīya doṣa kṛta lakṣaṇa lakṣyān
sat cikitsitam iha pravidhāsye sādhya sādhya vidhinā pratibaddham
bhāva arthaḥ
putra rakṣaṇa parāḥ mada mattāḥ grāsa lobha vaśataḥ pada ghātāt
sparśa taḥ pi bha
yatas api ca sarpāḥ te daśanti bahudhā adhiṃkara ūṣāt
bhāva arthaḥ
bhaya bhīta visarpā
iti pāṭha antaram

original: daṃśamatra phaṇināṃ trividhaṃ syāt svarpitaṃ raditamudvihitaṃ ca /
analyzed: daṃśam atra phaṇinām trividham syāt svarpitam raditam udvihitam ca
su arpitam sa viṣa danta padaiḥ eka dvika trika caturbhiḥ iha syāt
tat nimagna daśana kṣata yuktam śophavat viṣama tīvra viṣam syāt
tat viṣam viṣa haraiḥ ati śīghram nāśayet daśana kalpam aśeṣam
bhāva arthaḥ
lohita asita sita dyuti rājī rājitam śvayathumat ca yat anyat
tat bhavet racitam alpa viṣam jñātvā naram viviṣam āśu iha kuryāt
bhāva arthaḥ
svasthaḥ eva manujaḥ upi ahi daṣṭaḥ su accha śoṇita yuta kṣata yuktaḥ

original: yatkṣataṃ śvayathunā parihīnaṃ nirviṣaṃ bhavati tadvihitākhyam // 85 //
analyzed: yat kṣatam śvayathunā parihīnam nirviṣam bhavati tat vihita ākhyam
bhāva arthaḥ
sparśanāt tad abhighāta nimittāt kṣobhita anila kṛtaḥ viviṣaḥ yam
bhāva arthaḥ
chatra lāṃgala śaśāṃka su cakra svastika aṃkuśa dharāḥ phaṇinaḥ te
yāṃti śīghram acirāt kupitāḥ darvīkarāḥ sa pavanāḥ prabhavanti
bhāva arthaḥ
maṇḍalaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ bahu varṇaiḥ citritāḥ iva vibhānti ati dīrghāḥ
maṃda gāminaḥ iha agni biṣa āḍhyāḥ saṃbhavanti bhuvi maṇḍalinaḥ te
bhāva arthaḥ
citritā iva su citra virājī rājitā nija ruce sphurita ābhā

original: vāruṇāḥ kaphakṛtā vararājīmaṃta ityabhihitāḥ bhuvi sarpāḥ // 89 //
analyzed: vāruṇāḥ kapha kṛtāḥ vararājīmaṃtaḥ iti abhihitāḥ bhuvi sarpāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
bhoginaḥ pavana kopa karāḥ te pitta mukta bahu maṇḍalinaḥ te
jīva rājita śarīra yutā śleṣmāṇam ugram adhikam janayati
bhāva arthaḥ
yad vaya vyatikara udbhava sarpāḥ te dvi doṣa gaṇa kopa karāḥ te
vāta kopa janita akhila cinhāḥ saṃbhavanti phaṇi daṣṭa viṣe ismin
bhāva arthaḥ
mad viṣa prakāṭitāni viditvā śodhayet tad ucita auṣadha maṃtraiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
darvīkara ugra viṣa vega kṛtān vikārān vakṣyāmahe pravara lakṣaṇa lakṣitāḥ tān

original: ādau viṣaṃ rudhiramāśu vidūṣya raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ karoti piśitaṃ ca tathā dvitīye // 93 //
analyzed: ādau viṣam rudhiram āśu vidūṣya raktam kṛṣṇam karoti piśitam ca tathā dvitīye

original: cakṣurgurutvamadhikaṃ śiraso rujā ca tadvattṛtīyaviṣavegakṛto vikāraḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ guru tvam adhikam śirasaḥ rujā ca tadvat tṛtīya viṣa vega kṛtaḥ vikāraḥ
koṣṭham prapadya viṣam āśu kapha prasekam kuryāt caturtha viṣa vega viśeṣitaḥ tu

original: srotaḥ vidhāya kapha eva ca paṃcame'smin vege karoti kupitaḥ svayamugrahikkā /
analyzed: srotaḥ vidhāya kaphaḥ eva ca paṃcame smin vege karoti kupitaḥ svayam ugra hikkā
ṣaṣṭe vidāha hṛdaya graha mūrcchanāni prāṇaiḥ vimokṣayati saptama vega jātaḥ  /
bhāva arthaḥ

original: tadvacca maṇḍaliviṣe'pi viṣapraduṣṭaṃ raktaṃ bhavetprathamavegata eva pītam /
analyzed: tadvat ca maṇḍali viṣa ipi viṣa praduṣṭam raktam bhavet prathama vegataḥ eva pītam
māṃsa sa pīta nayana ānana pāṇḍura tvam āpādayet kaṭuka vaktram api dvitīye

original: tṛṣṇā tṛtīyaviṣavegakṛtā caturthe tīvrajvaro viditapaṃcamato vidāhaḥ /
analyzed: tṛṣṇā tṛtīya viṣa vega kṛtā caturthe tīvra jvaraḥ vidita paṃcamataḥ vidāhaḥ
syāt ṣaṣṭa saptama biṣa adhika vegayoḥ api ukta kramāt smṛti vināśa yuta asu mokṣaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
rājīmatām api viṣam prathama ūru vege
raktam pradūṣya kurute iruṇa picchila ābham
lālā sṛtim su bahulām api tat tṛtīye
manyā sthira tva śirasā ūti rujām caturthe
vāc saṃgam āśu kuruta idhika paṃcame smin
vege viṣam gala nipātam api iha ṣaṣṭe
prāṇa kṣayam bahu kaphāt api saptame tat
bhāva arthaḥ
paṃcāśat uttara catuśśata saṃkhyayā ātta mātrā sthitam viṣam iha ugra tayā ātma daṃśe

original: dhātvaṃtareṣvapi tathaiva marudvinītaṃ vegāṃtarāṇi kurute svayameva sapta // 100 //
analyzed: dhātu aṃtareṣu api tathā eva marut vinītam vega aṃtarāṇi kurute svayam eva sapta
bhāva arthaḥ
śastra aśani pratimam ātma guṇa upapannam
rāśu eva nāśayati viśva janam viṣam tat
tasmāt āhravīmi agada taṃtram atha ātma śaktyā
bhāva arthaḥ

original: sarvaissarpaireva daṣṭasya śākhāsūrdhvaṃ badhvā cāṃgulīnāṃ catuṣke /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ sarpaiḥ eva daṣṭasya śākhāsu ūrdhvam badhvā ca aṃgulīnām catuṣke
utkṛtya asṛj mokṣayet daṃśataḥ nyatra utkṛtya agnau saṃdahet cūṣayet vā
bhāva arthaḥ
maṃtraiḥ sarvam nirviṣam syāt viṣam tat yadvat tadvat bheṣajaiḥ nā eva sādhyam
śīghram maṃtraiḥ jīva rakṣām vidhāya prājñaḥ paścāt yojayet bheṣajāni
bhāva arthaḥ
daṃśāt ūrdhva adhas samastāḥ śirāḥ tāḥ vidvān astrāt baṃdhanāt rakta mokṣam
kuryāt sarva aṃga āśrita ugre viṣe ismin tadvat dhīmān paṃca paṃcāṅga saṃsthāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: duṣṭe rakte nihṛte tadviṣākhyaṃ śīghraṃ sarvaṃ nirviṣatvaṃ prayāti /
analyzed: duṣṭe rakte nihṛte tad viṣa ākhyam śīghram sarvam nirviṣa tvam prayāti
paścāt śīta aṃbhaḥ abhiṣiktaḥ viṣa ārtaḥ dadhi ājya kṣīraiḥ pibet auṣadhāni
bhāva arthaḥ

original: śastraṃ prāk darvīkarāṇāṃ tu vege raktasrāvastadvitīye'gadānām /
analyzed: śastram prāk darvīkarāṇām tu vege rakta srāvaḥ tad vitīya gadānām
pānam nasyam tad tṛtīya iṃjanam syāt samyak vāmyaḥ tad caturtha igadaḥ api

original: pokte vege paṃcame vāpi ṣaṣṭe śītaistoyairdhvastagātraṃ viṣārtam /
analyzed: pokte vege paṃcame vā api ṣaṣṭe śītaiḥ toyaiḥ dhvasta gātram viṣa ārtam

original: śītadravyālepanaiḥ saṃviliptam tīkṣṇairūrdhvaṃ śodhayettaṃ ca dhīmān // 107 //
analyzed: śīta dravya ālepanaiḥ saṃviliptam tīkṣṇaiḥ ūrdhvam śodhayet tam ca dhīmān

original: vegepyasminsaptame cāpi dhīmān tīkṣṇaṃ nasyaṃ cāṃjanaṃ copayujya /
analyzed: vege pi asmin saptame ca api dhīmān tīkṣṇam nasyam ca aṃjanam ca upayujya

original: kuryānmūrdhnāśukṣataṃ kākapādākāraṃ sāṃdraṃ carma tatra pradadhyāt // 108 //
analyzed: kuryāt mūrdhnā aśu kṣatam kāka pāda ākāram sāṃdram carma tatra pradadhyāt
bhāva arthaḥ
prāc vege ismin maṇḍalaiḥ maṇḍitānām astrāṇi evam na atigāḍham vidadhyāt
sarpiḥ miśram pāyayitvā agadam tam śīghram samyak vāmayet tad dvitīye
tadvat vāvyaḥ tad tṛtīye tu vege śeṣeṣu anyat pūrvavat sarvam eva
rājīmadbhiḥ daṣṭa vege api pūrve samyak śastreṇa atigāḍham vidārya

original: sāṃtardīpālābunā tatra duṣṭaṃ raktaṃ saṃśodhyaṃ bhavennirviṣārtham /
analyzed: tatra duṣṭam raktam saṃśodhyam bhavet nirviṣa artham

original: chardiṃ kṛtvā tadvitīye'gadaṃ vā tatsiddhaṃ vā pāyayetsadyavāgūm // 111 //
analyzed: chardim kṛtvā tad vitīye gadam vā tad siddham vā pāyayet sat yavāgūm
śeṣān vegān āśu darvīkarāṇām vegeṣu uktaiḥ auṣadhaiḥ sādhayet tān
ūrdhva adhas saṃśodhanaiḥ tīvra nasyaiḥ sākṣāt tīkṣṇaiḥ añjana ādyaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: kṛṣṇāsrāvaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ kṣataṃ yā dāhopetaṃ pūtimāṃsaṃ viśīrṇaṃ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa āsrāvam kṛṣṇa varṇam kṣatam yā dāha upetam pūti māṃsam viśīrṇam
jānīyāt tat digdha viddham śara ādyaiḥ krūraiḥ dattam yat viṣam sa vraṇe asmin
bhāva arthaḥ
kṛṣṇa upetam mūrcchayā ca abhibhūtam martyam saṃtāpa jvara utpīḍita aṃgam

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyādviṣaṃ tatra dattaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ māṃsaṃ śīryate yadbraṇe'smin // 114 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vidyāt viṣam tatra dattam kṛṣṇam māṃsam śīryate yat braṇe asmin
bhāva arthaḥ

original: utklinnaṃ tatpūtimāṃsaṃ vyapohya raktaṃ saṃsrāvyaṃ jalūkāprapātaiḥ /
analyzed: utklinnam tat pūti māṃsam vyapohya raktam saṃsrāvyam jalūkā prapātaiḥ
śodhyaḥ ca ayam syāt viṣa āḍhya vraṇa ārtaḥ śīta kvāthaiḥ kṣīriṇām secayet tam
śīta dravyaiḥ sat viṣa dhnaiḥ su piṣṭaiḥ vastram sa aṃtardāya dihyāt vraṇam tat

original: kuryādevaṃ kaṃṭakottīkṣṇato vā pittobhdūte cāpi sākṣādviṣe'smin // 116 //
analyzed: kuryāt evam kaṃṭaka uttīkṣṇataḥ vā ca api sākṣāt viṣa ismin
bhāva arthaḥ
māṃjiṣṭhā madhuka trivṛt surata rudrākṣā hāridrā dvayam
rhanyāt sarva viṣāṇi sarpa ripu vati eṣaḥ gadaḥ prastutaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
siṃdhūttham sa viḍam viḍaṃga sahitam sauvarcalam cūrṇitam

original: sarvaṃ gavyaghṛtena miśritamidaṃ śrṛṃge nidhāya sthitaṃ /
analyzed: sarvam gavya ghṛtena miśritam idam śrṛṃge nidhāya sthitam

original: sarcāṇyeva viṣāṇi nāśayati tat sarvātmanā yojitam // 118 //
analyzed: viṣāṇi nāśayati tat sarva ātmanā yojitam
bhāva arthaḥ
sthauṇeyam suradāru caṃdana yugam śigru dvayam guggulum
tālīsam sa kuṭam naram kuṭajam ugra arka agni sauvarcala
kuṣṭham sat kraṭurohiṇī trikaṭukam saṃcūrṇya saṃsthāpitam
sādhayet  /
bhāva arthaḥ

original: tālīsaṃ bahulaṃ viḍaṃgasahitaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ viḍaṃ saidhavaṃ /
analyzed: tālīsam bahulam viḍaṃga sahitam kuṣṭham viḍam saidhavam
bhārṅgī hiṃgu mṛgādanī sa kiṇihim pāṭhām paṭolām vacām
nyācūrṇya aja payaḥ ghṛta ambu sahitāni etat garam nirāhet
bhāva arthaḥ
maṃjiṣṭhā madhuśigru śigru rajanī lākṣā śilā leṃgudī
pṛthvīkā aṃsa hareṇukām sama dhṛtām sa cūrṇya sammiśritam
sarvaiḥ mūtra gaṇaiḥ samasta lavaṇaiḥ āloḍya saṃsthāpitam
śrṛṃge tat mṛtam api alam nara varam saṃjīvanaḥ jīvayet  /
bhāva arthaḥ
śvetām
vyāghrī meghaninādikām bṛhatikām aṃkola nīlīm api
tiktālābu sa cālinī phala rasena āloḍya śrṛṃge sthitam

original: yasminveśmani tatra naiva phaṇinaḥ kīṭāḥ kuto vā grahāḥ // 122 //
analyzed: yasmin veśmani tatra nā eva phaṇinaḥ kīṭāḥ kutas vā grahāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
proktāḥ vāta kapha utthita akhila viṣa pradhvaṃsinaḥ sarvathā
yogāḥ pitta samudbhaveṣu api viṣeṣu atyanta śīta anvitāḥ
vakṣyaṃte api sugaṃdhikā yava phala drākṣā lavaṃga tvacaḥ
kuṃda iṃdīvara siṃdhuvāraka kapittha iṃdrāhva purṣpī yutām
ka pustake na upalabhyate
sarva kṣīra ghṛta plutāḥ sama sitāḥ sarva ātmanā yojitāḥ

original: kṣipraṃ te śamayaṃti maṇḍalaviṣaṃ karmeva dharmā daśa // 124 //
analyzed: kṣipram te śamayanti maṇḍala viṣam karma iva dharmāḥ daśa
bhāva arthaḥ
rā liptān vaṃśa śaṃkha prakaṭa paṭaha bherī mṛdaṃgān sva nādaiḥ
kuryuḥ te nirviṣa tvam viṣa yuta manujān āmṛtān āśu digdhān
dṛṣṭvā āsyam tāraṇāni api anudina
macira sparśanāt staṃbha vṛkṣāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
vyāpta sthitam syāt su janam iva sukha sparśataḥ śukra vat vā
teṣām daṃṣṭrāḥ yatas tāḥ baḍiśa vat dati vakrāḥ tatas te bhujaṃgāḥ
muṃcati udhdṛtya tābhyaḥ viṣam ati viṣamam viśva doṣa prakopam
bhāva arthaḥ
ati uṣṇam takṣṇi muktam viṣam ati viṣa taṃtra pravīṇaiḥ samastam
tasmāt śīta aṃbubhiḥ tam viṣa yuta manujam secayet tat viditvā
ruṣṇa ālepa upanāhaiḥ adhika viṣa haraiḥ sādhayet āśu dhīmān
bhāva arthaḥ
tālaka ābham sṛjati malam iha ādhmāna niṣpīḍita aṃgaḥ

original: phenaṃ vaktrādajasraṃ na dahati hṛdayaṃ cāgnirapyāturasya //
analyzed: phenam vaktrāt ajasram na dahati hṛdayam ca agniḥ api āturasya
tām pṛthak atha kathayāmi arjita āpta upadeśāt
bhāva arthaḥ
khyāteṣu arkṣeṣu daṣṭā śvayathuḥ api su kṛṣṇa ati raktaḥ ca daṃśe
daṃṣṭrāṇām vā apadāni svasita rudhira yuktāni catvāri yasnin  /
kṣudh tṛṣ pīḍā abhibhūtāḥ sthaviratara narāḥ kṣīṇa gātrāḥ ca bālāḥ
pitta atyaṃta ātapa agni prahata tanu yutā yā iti ajīrṇa āmaya ārtāḥ
yeṣām nāsā avasādaḥ mukham ati kuṭilam saṃdhi bhaṃgāḥ ca
hanu gatam api tān varjayet sarpa daṣṭān
bhāva arthaḥ
rājyaḥ na eva āhateṣu prakaṭa tara latābhiḥ kṣatena eva raktam

original: śītāṃbhobhirniṣikte na bhavati satataṃ romaharṣo narasya //
analyzed: śīta aṃbhobhiḥ niṣikte na bhavati satatam roma harṣaḥ narasya
vartiḥ vaktrāt ajasram prasarati kapha jā raktam ūrdhvam tathā adhas
suptiḥ muktam vidārya pravidita vidhinā varjayet sarpa daṣṭān
bhāva arthaḥ
vyākīrṇa āpāda kīṭa prabhava bahu viṣa dhvaṃsanāya auṣadhāni
doṣa traividhya mārga pravidita vidhinā asādhya sādhya krameṇa
pravyaktam proktam etat purujina matam āśritya vakṣyāmi sākṣāt
bhāva arthaḥ
martyāḥ ca śvāpadānām daśana nakha mukhaiḥ dārita ugrakṣaveṣu
prodyat tṛṣṇā asṛj udyat śvayathu yuta mahā vedanā vyākuleṣu
vāta śleṣma uttha tīvra prabala viṣa yuteṣu uddhata unmāda yuktān
martyān anyān atha anye paruṣatara ruṣā mānuṣān te daśaṃti  /
bhāva arthaḥ
vyālaiḥ daṣṭāḥ kadācid tad anuguṇa yutāḥ cāru ceṣṭāḥ yadi syuḥ
tān eva ādarśa dīpa ātapa jala gata biṃbān prapaśyaṃti ye ca
śadu a sparśa avalokāt adhikatara jala trāsataḥ nitrasaṃti
praspaṣṭa ādaṣṭa dehān api pariharatām dṛṣṭa riṣṭān viśiṣṭān
bhāva arthaḥ

original: śukrogrā mūṣikākhyā prakaṭabahuvidhā yatra teṣāṃ tu śukrāṃ /
analyzed: śukrā ugrā mūṣika ākhyā prakaṭa bahuvidhā yatra teṣām tu
spṛṣṭaiḥ daṃtaiḥ nakhaiḥ vā api upahata manujānām kṣate duṣṭa raktam
kuryāt utkarṇikā ati śvayathu piṭakikā maṇḍala graṃthi mūrcchā
tṛṣṇā tīvra jvara ādīn trividha viṣama doṣa udbhavān vedanā āḍhyān
bhāva arthaḥ
ye daṣṭāmūṣaka ākhyaiḥ nṛpataru madana aṃkola kośātakībhiḥ
samyak vāmyāḥ virecyāḥ api bahu nija doṣa kramāt kuṣṭhanīlī
peyam syāt taiḥ śirīṣa aṃbuda rava kiṇihī kiṃśuka kṣāra toyaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
pratyekam prastha bhāgaiḥ dadhi ghṛta payasām kvātha bhāgaiḥ caturbhiḥ
vajra arka alarka gojī nṛpataru kuṭaja vyāghrikā naktamālaiḥ
kalkaiḥ kāpittha nīlī trikaṭuka rajanī rohiṇīnām sama aṃśaiḥ

original: pakvaṃ sarpirviṣaghnaṃ śamayati sahasā mūṣakāṇāṃ viṣaṃ ca // 137 //
analyzed: pakvam sarpiḥ viṣa ghnam śamayati sahasā mūṣakāṇām viṣam ca
bhāva arthaḥ
saṃmūrchita ādyāḥ anala pavana toya udbhavāḥ te tridhā uktā
teṣām doṣa anurūpaiḥ upaśamana vidhiḥ procyate sādhya sādhya
vyādhīn prati auṣadha ādyaiḥ akhila viṣa haraiḥ advitīyaiḥ amoghaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
lūtā aśeṣa ugra kīṭa prabhṛtibhiḥ iha daṣṭa pradeśeṣu teṣām
nṝṇām tat maṃda madhya ādika viṣa hata rakteṣu tad prokta doṣaiḥ
jāyaṃte maṇḍalāni śvayathu piṭakikāḥ graṃthayaḥ tīvra śophāḥ
dadru śvitrāḥ ca kaṇḍū kiṭibha kaṭhina sat karṇikā ādi ugra rogāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
ajñānāt kīṭa dehān aśana guṇa yutān bhakṣayitvā manuṣyāḥ
nānā rogān aneka prakaṭatara mahā upadravān āpnuvaṃti
teṣām dūṣīviṣa ghnaiḥ abhihita vara bhaiṣajya yogaiḥ praśāṃtim
kuryāt anyāni athārtham nikhila viṣa harāṇi auṣadhāni bravīmi
bhāva arthaḥ
arka aṃkola agnika aśvāṃtaka ghana nicula pragraha aśmaṃtakānām
śleṣmātakī āmalakya arjuna nṛpa kaṭuka śrī kapittha snuhīnām
māsphotā pāṭalī siṃdhuka taru ciribilva arimeda drumāṇām
gojī sarja ūru bhūrja asana taru tilaka plakṣa soma aṃghrikāṇām
ṭuṃṭūka aśoka kāśmarī amarataru śirīṣa ugraśigru dvayānām
uṣṇīka araṃjaka aruṣkara vara sarala udyat palāśa dvayānām
nakta ahānām ca bhasma akhilam iha vipacet ṣaḍguṇaiḥ mūtra bhāgaiḥ
tad mūtra aśuddha śukla ambara parigalitam kṣāra kalpena paktvā
vega āgāra uttha dhūmam tagara rucaka hiṃgūni saṃcūrṇya vastraiḥ
ślakṣṇam cūrṇam ca sākṣāt nikhila viṣa haram sarvathā etat prayuktam
bhāva arthaḥ
āśoṣya ācūrṇya da tvā ghṛta guḍa sahitam sthāpitam go viṣāṇe
tat sākṣāt sthāvaram jaṃgama viṣam adhikam kṛtrimam ca api sarvam
hanyāt nasya aṃjana ālepana bahuvidha pāna prayogaiḥ prayuktam
bhāva arthaḥ
bhūtam martyam avekṣya śāṃta tanu saṃtāpa prasanna iṃdriyam
nyat mūlaiḥ ca ta toya pakvam akhilam
dadyāt sa peyā ādikam
bhāva arthaḥ
nidrām ca api divā avyavāyam adhikam vyāyāmam ati ātapam
tyaktvā tīvra viṣeṣu sarvam aśanam śīta kriyā saṃyutam
yojyam kīṭa viṣeṣu aśeṣa mahimam saṃsvedana ālepanam
bhāva arthaḥ
r upahata tanu martyeṣu ugra vegeṣu teṣām
kṣapayati niśita udyat śastra pātaiḥ vidārya
su ahi viṣam iva sādhyaḥ syāt mahā maṃtra taṃtraiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
iti jina vaktra nirgata su śāstra mahā aṃbunidheḥ
sakala padārtha vistṛta taraṃga kula ākulataḥ
nisṛtam idam hi śīkara nibham jagat eka hitam
bhāva arthaḥ
vīra jina avasāna vṛṣabha ādi jinān abhivaṃdya
ghora saṃsāra mahā arṇava uttaraṇa kāraṇa dharma patha upadeśakān
rbhūri cikitsitāni saha karma gaṇaiḥ kathayāmi aśeṣatas
bhāva arthaḥ

original: smādapi māṃsato bhavati meda, ito'sthi tato'pi //
analyzed: smāt api māṃsataḥ bhavati medaḥ itas asthi tatas api
majjātaḥ śubha śukram iti abhihitāḥ iha saptavidhāḥ ca dhātavaḥ
sa uṣṇa su śīta bhūta vaśataḥ ca viśeṣita doṣa saṃbhavāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
takra matas abhighāta rahitāni paṃca su lakṣaṇāni api
snāyu yuta aṣṭa bheda nija vāsa gaṇāḥ kathitāḥ rujām iha
bhāva arthaḥ
mlāṣana nasya pānaka balagraha vedhana sīvanāni api
rvāpaṇa maṃtravarti vamana ativirecana cūrṇa sa vraṇaḥ
dhdūpa rasakriyā samavasādana srā uddhata sādanāt api
rma uttara vasti viṣa ghna su bṛṃhaṇa ugra sa kṣāra sita
krimi ghna karaṇa anna yuta adhika rakṣāṇāni api
kṣāra mahauṣadhaiḥ akhila roga gaṇa praśamāya bhāṣitam
bhāva arthaḥ
gdhāmyati roṣa maithuna cira āsana caṃkramaṇa sthiti prayā
sa uccavacaḥ sa śoka guru bhojana bhakṣaṇa vāhanāni api
dra ādi akhilāni asātmya vahu doṣa karāṇi apahṛti amā
sam ekam nija doṣa saṃśamana bheṣaja siddha jala ādi aśeṣam ā
hāram udāharāmi anupama āgama coditam agni vṛddhaye  /
bhāva arthaḥ
nṛṇām anala vardhana karaiḥ amṛta ādibhiḥ āvahet naraḥ
yatna para ugni maṇubhiḥ tṛṇa kāṣṭha cayaiḥ krama kramā
datra yathā virūkṣa gaṇaiḥ parivṛddhitaram kariṣyati  /
bhāva arthaḥ
uṣṇa jalam tathā eva śrṛta śītalam api anurūpatas
yavāgūm sa vilepya dūṣa vara dhūpya khalān akṛtān kṛtān api
svalpa ghṛtam ghṛta adhika su bhojanam iti atha akhilam
niyojayet tri dvi yuta eka bheda gaṇanā divaseṣu anala trika kramāt
bhāva arthaḥ
dāha tṛṣā atisā uṣṇa mada madya hata an ati raktapittinaḥ
strī vyasana ati mūrcchana parān api śītala bhojanaiḥ bhṛśam
pīta ghṛta anvirecita tanūn anila ati balāsa rogiṇaḥ
klinna malān narān adhikam uṣṇataraiḥ samupācaret sadā
bhāva arthaḥ
vāta kṛta āmayān ati virūkṣa tanūn adhika vyavāyinaḥ
kleśa parān viśeṣa bahu bhakṣaṇa bhojana pānaka ādibhiḥ
sneha yutaiḥ
rūkṣataraiḥ niraṃtaram aram puruṣa anaśanaiḥ samācaret
bhāva arthaḥ
dgāri narān nayet iha viśuṣkataraiḥ anala abhivṛddhaye
maṃda sama agnikāt laghubhiḥ eka vara dvika bhojanaiḥ kramāt
bhāva arthaḥ
ca hīnataram ṣaṣ ṛtu pracoditam
doṣa śamana artham uktam ati puṣṭi karam bala vṛṣya kāraṇam
svastha jana ucitam bhavati vṛtti karam pratipāditam jinaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
dbhaṃṣaja karma nirmita guṇān daśa bheṣaja kāla saṃkhyayā
riṣṭa marma sahita anupasaṃharaṇaiḥ bravīmi aham
bhāva arthaḥ
prāhuḥ aśeṣa bheṣaja kṛta akhila karma samasta vedinaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
prātar iha auṣadham balavatām akhila āmaya nāśa kāraṇam
prāk api bhaktataḥ bhavati śīghra vipāka karam sukha āvaham
ūrdhvam atha aśanāt upari roga gaṇān api madhya gam
sva madhya gān vināśayati dattam idam bhiṣajā adhijānatā
bhāva arthaḥ
aṃtara bhaktam auṣadham atha agni karam paripīyate tathā
madhya gate dinasya niyata ubhaya kāla su bhojana aṃtare
rdeyam iha aśanam tat uditam sva guṇaiḥ ca sabhakta nāmakam
bhāva arthaḥ
mudga viśeṣa bheṣajam iha aśanataḥ prathama avasānayoḥ
dgāriṣu bheṣajāni asakṛt atra muhur nuhur iti udīritam
bhāva arthaḥ
grāsa gatam vicūrṇam abala agniṣu dīpana vṛṃhaṇa ādikam
hān api yojayet iti daśa auṣadha kāla vicāraṇa kramāt
bhāva arthaḥ
cārya mataiḥ pramāṇam api
gānija lakṣaṇaiḥ akhila śāstra phalam sakalam bravīmi aham
bhāva arthaḥ
maṣṭa bhāgam avaśiṣṭam aparaiḥ śrutakīrti kumāra naṃdibhiḥ
ripra mukhaiḥ kaṣāya paripāka vidhiḥ vihitaḥ purātanaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
pāda śeṣita tad ardha dugdha sahite ca tad ardha ghṛte ghṛtasya
pāda auṣadha kalka yuktam akhilam paripācya ghṛta avaśeṣitam
tad vara pūjya pāda kathitam tilaja ādi vipāka lakṣaṇam
bhāva arthaḥ
ṣu eṣu samasta sūri mata bheda vikalpa kṛtaḥ praśasyate
ca nija nāma guṇaiḥ api śāstra vedinaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
sneha vara auṣadha adhika viveka guṇam mṛdu pākam ādiśet
sneha vivikta kalka bahu picchilataḥ bhavati iha cikkaṇam
bhūtam avekṣya tam khara su cikkaṇam āhuḥ atas uti dagdha tā
bhāva arthaḥ
sneha paripramāṇam ṣoḍaśikā kuḍubam dravasya cūrṇam
biḍāla pāda sadṛśam vara kalkam iha akṣa mātrakam
na adhikatām vadaṃti bahu saṃśamana auṣadha saṃgrahe nṛṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
gaiḥ akhilaiḥ rasāḥ trika yuta adhika ṣaṣṭi vikalpaka alpitā
karma nirmala guṇaḥ bhiṣaj atra niyujya sādhayet  /
bhāva arthaḥ

original: rasabhedoṃ kā khulāsā isa prakāra haiṃ
analyzed: rasa bheda kā khulāsā isa prakāra haiṃ
dyat vara bheṣajaiḥ atiniyuktam aśeṣa vikāra vigraham
vicārya bahuḥ iṣṭa gaṇaiḥ avabudhya sādhayet  /
bhāva arthaḥ
nyatra nirūpayāmi akhila karma ripūn apahaṃtum icchatām
tatva vidām nṛṇām amala mukti vadhū nihita abhikāṃkṣiṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
ṣa āgama pāraga sva manasā eva vicārya niścitam vadet
bhāva arthaḥ
svapna gata uti kaṃṭaka tarūn adhirohati ced bhaya ākulaḥ
bhīma guhā antare pi giri kūṭa taṭāt patati hi adhomukhaḥ
tāla ādi samudbhavaḥ bhavati tad jana māraṇa kāraṇa āvaham
bhāva arthaḥ

original: vdyālamṛgān vrajet samadhiruhya diśaṃ tvaritaṃ ca dakṣiṇaṃ //
analyzed: vdyāla mṛgān vrajet samadhiruhya diśam tvaritam ca dakṣiṇam
lyā aṃbara dhāriṇī parihasantī asakṛt parinṛtyatī iva san
tyaṃta virūpiṇībhiḥ avagṛhya naraḥ yadi nīyate itra
kārpāsa tila uttha kalka khala loha cayān api yaḥ prapaśyati
bhāva arthaḥ
varjayet
bhāva arthaḥ
svastha jana ucirāt adhika roga cayam samupaiti
svapna gaṇān bravīmi urutara āmaya saṃhati bheda vedinam
bhāva arthaḥ
svapna gaṇān jineṃdra bhavanāni manohara mitra bāṃdhavān
rohaṇāni api ca saukhya karāṇi adhipaśyatām nṛṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
ga vyathita aṃgayaṣṭim athavā tam atīta samasta vedanam
tyakta nija svabhāvam asita dvija tad rasa noṣṭha niṣṭhuram
stabdha nimagna rakta viṣama īkṣaṇam udgata locanam tyajet
bhāva arthaḥ
paśyati sarvam eva vikṛta ākṛti mārta viśeṣa śadba jātim
vikṛtim śruṇoti vikṛtim parijighrati gaṃdham anyatas
sarva rasān api svayam apeta rasaḥ virasān bravīti yaḥ
sparśam aram na vetti vilapati abalaḥ tam api tyajet bhiṣak
bhāva arthaḥ
kurute maraṇam
bhāva arthaḥ
yaḥ viparīta rūpa rasa gaṃdha vivarṇa mukhaḥ
rbhāti sita asitaiḥ aruṇitaiḥ animitta kṛtaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: yaśca divāniśaṃ svapiti yaśca na ca svapiti /
analyzed: yaḥ ca divāniśam svapiti yaḥ ca na ca svapiti
spṛṣṭa lalāṭa kūṭa ghaṭita uchrita bhūri śiraḥ
ryaḥ pralapanāt patati api sa cetanaḥ eva naraḥ  /
yaḥ ca samasta lokam api dhūma hima aṃbu vṛtam
yaḥ ca dharā talam likhati tad vivara ākulitam
yaḥ ca rajaḥ vikīrṇa ravi paśyati ca ātma vapuḥ

original: yaśca rujaṃ na ṣetti dahanādikṛtāṃ manujaḥ // 43 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca rujam na setti dahana ādi kṛtām manujaḥ
yaḥ ca na paśyati pravidita pratibiṃva maram
yaḥ ca niṣeṭhayate kanaka mākṣika paddhatibhiḥ
yaḥ ca divākaram niśi śaśi dyuti vanhi anilam
yaḥ ca śarīriṇam samupalakṣayati prakaṭam
yasya lalāṭa paṭṭam upayaṃti ca yūka gaṇā
yasya śirasi akāraṇa vikīrṇa rajaḥ nicayaḥ
yasya nimagnam eva hanu vilaṃba bṛhat vṛṣaṇam
yasya vinaṣṭa hīna vikṛta svara tā ca bhavet
dyasya divā niśā iva bṛhat api ati sūkṣmataram
yasya mṛduḥ tathā kaṭhina vat himam api ahimam
yasya samasta vastu viparīta guṇam tu bhavet
tān parihṛtya duṣṭa bahu riṣṭa gaṇān manujān
sādhu vicārya ceṣṭita nija svabhāva guṇaiḥ
sādhyatama āmayān satatam eva sa sādhayatu
bhāva arthaḥ
proktān etān iṣṭa riṣṭān manuṣyān
tyaktvā dhīmān marma saṃpīḍitān ca
jñātvā vaidyaḥ prārabhet tad cikitsām
yatnāt vakṣye marmaṇām lakṣaṇāni
bhāva arthaḥ
pāda aṃguli aṃguṣṭha madhye tu marma
kṣipram nāmnā ākṣepakena atra mṛtyuḥ
tad madhya aṃbulyām ānupūrvyam talasya
prāhuḥ madhye duḥkha mṛtyum hṛd ākhyam
bhāva arthaḥ
madhyāt pādasya ubhayatra upariṣṭāt
kūrcaḥ nāmnā atra kṣate tad bhramaḥ syāt
gulpha adhastāt kūrcaśīrṣa uti duḥkham
śophaḥ gulphe stabdha supti svaruj ca
bhāva arthaḥ
pārṣṇi pratyūrdha sva jaṃghā ardha bhāge
rakta srāvāt indravastau mṛtiḥ syāt
jaṃghā ūrvoḥ saṃdhau tu
khaṃja tvam tatra kṣate vedanā ca
bhāva arthaḥ
jānuni ūrdhvam tri aṃgulāt āṇiḥ ucca
saktthnaḥ śopha vṛddhiḥ kṣate asmin
ūrvoḥ madhye syāt iha urvī iti marma
rakta srāvāt saktthni śopha kṣayaḥ ca
bhāva arthaḥ
ūrvyoḥ tu ūrdhvam vaṃkṣaṇasya api adhastāt ūroḥ mūle rohitākṣe pi tadvat
pakṣāghātaḥ sakthi śopha usra pātaḥ mṛtyuḥ vā syāt prāṇinām vedanābhiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
aṇḍasya adhas vaṃkṣaṇasya aṃtarāle śukradhvaṃsī syāt viṭīpa ākhya marma
sakthnā ekasmin tāni atha ekādaśa eva sakthi anyasmin bāhu yugme pi tadvat
bhāva arthaḥ
pāde gulpha sujānu sat viṭapa nāmāni eva vaiśeṣataḥ
ścatvāriṃśat iha akhilāni niyatam marmāṇi śākhāsu alam
bhāva arthaḥ
atha pravakṣāmi udara urasa sthita an aśeṣa marmāṇi viśeṣa lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: gude ca vastau baranābhimaṇḍale kṣate ca sadyo maraṇaṃ bhavennṛṇām // 56 //
analyzed: gude ca vastau bara nābhi maṇḍale kṣate ca sadyas maraṇam bhavet nṛṇām  /
bhāva arthaḥ
urasi atha āmāśaya mārga saṃsthitam stanāṃtare tad hṛdaye hataḥ punar
karoti sadyas maraṇam tathā aṃgula dvaye pi aghastāt stanayoḥ iha apare
kapha adhikena stana mūla marmaṇi kaphaḥ prakopāt maraṇam bhavet nṛṇām
stana upari dvi aṃgulataḥ tu marmaṇī sa rakta kopāt stanarohitau tathā
bhāva arthaḥ
atha aṃsakūṭāt upari sva pārśvayoḥ kapālaka ākhye bhavataḥ tu marmaṇī

original: tayośca mṛtyū rudhire'tipūyatāṃ gate punarvātavahe tathāpare // 59 //
analyzed: tayoḥ ca mṛtyuḥ rudhira iti pūya tām gate punar vāta vahe tathā apare
pradhāna nāḍyār ubhayatra vakṣasaḥ mateḥ tu apastaṃbha viśeṣa marmaṇī
tatas ca mṛtyuḥ bhavati iha dehinām sva vāta pūrṇa udara kāsa nisvanaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
hase graṃtha aṃtaraḥ meṃ
apalāpa
bhī kahate haiṃ
proktāḥ dvādaśa marma lakṣaṇa guṇāḥ kukṣau tathā vakṣasi
prāyas pṛṣṭha gatāni api pratipadam vakṣāmi marmāṇi aham
baṃśasya ubhayatas kaṭīkataruṇe pṛṣṭhasya mūle prati
śroṇi asthi āśrita marmaṇi iha kurutaḥ śrukra kṣayaḥ klība tām
bhāva arthaḥ
pṛṣṭhasya ubhaya pārśvayoḥ ghana bahirbhāge tathā marmaṇi
vaṃśasya ubhayatas kukuṃdaraḥ iti prakhyāta sat nāmani

original: tatra syātsatataṃ nṛṇāṃ kṣatamadhaḥ kāye ca śophāvaham /
analyzed: tatra syāt satatam nṛṇām kṣatam adhas kāye ca śopha āvaham
ceṣṭā dhvaṃsa pare svaka āśaya nija pracchādane marmaṇī
śroṇī kāṃḍa yuga upari iha niyatam baddhau nitaṃbau tatas
śoṣaḥ kārśyam adhas śarīra nihitau anye ca marmāṇi atas
vasrāpūrṇa mahodareṇa maraṇam prāpnoti martyaḥ kṣate
bhāva arthaḥ
vaṃśasya ubhaya bhāgataḥ tana yugasya amūla tā upya ārjavam
pṛṣṭhe ismin bṛhatī dvaya bhihita marmaṇi atra rakta srute
mṛtyuḥ pṛṣṭa tala upari trika gate marmaṇi atha āsāṭake

original: syātāṃ tatphalake kṣate'pi karayoḥ svāpātiśoṣo nṛṇām // 64 //
analyzed: syātām tad phalake kṣate pi karayoḥ svāpa atiśoṣaḥ nṛṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
grīvā aṃsa dvaya madhya bhāga niyatau syātām krakanyā aṃsakau
tatra stabdha śira uṃsa bāhu nija pṛṣṭe syāt naraḥ vakṣite
vyākhyātāni atas vihita aśeṣāṇi vakṣyāmahe
bhāva arthaḥ
kaṃṭhe nāḍīm ubhayatas itas vyatyayāt nīlam anye
dve dve syātām adhikatara marmaṇi amī mūkataḥ vā
vaisvaṃrya vā rasanā bhāvataḥ mṛtyuḥ anyā
śca aṣṭau grīvā śirā mātṛkāḥ mṛtyu rūpāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
grīvā saṃdhau api ca śīrṣa tva kṛt marmaṇī dve
syātām mṛtyoḥ nilaya nija rūpe kṛkāṭa abhidhāne
karṇasya adhas vidhure iti marmaṇi atha karṇasaṃdhau
bādhiryam syāt upahatavatī tad pṛṣṭa bhāge
bhāva arthaḥ
ghrāṃṇasya aṃtargatam ubhayatas srotasaḥ mārga saṃsthe
marmaṇi ete api abhihata phaṇe tatra gaṃdha praṇāśaḥ
akṣṇoḥ bāhye prati dina kaṭa ākṣepi apāṃga abhidhāne
marmaṇi āṃdhyam janayataḥ itas tatra ghātāt narāṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
tābhyām sadyas maraṇam atha marma bhruvoḥ ūrdhva bhāge
vyutkṣepau api upari ca tayoḥ eva keśāṃta jātau
bhdrū madhye tat tat iva viditam syāt sthapanī eka marma
paṃca anye ca pravidita mahā saṃdhayaḥ ca uttamāṃge
sīmaṃta ākhyaḥ maraṇam api duścitta nāśa unmadaiḥ ca
bhāva arthaḥ
jihā ghrāṇa śravaṇa nayanam sva sva saṃtarpaṇīnām
madhye catvāri amālinaśirāṇām ca śrṛṃgāṭakāni
sadyas mṛtyūni adhikṛta śirā saṃdhibaṃdha eka saṃdhau
keśāvartau adhipatiḥ iti kṣipra mṛtyuḥ pradiṣṭaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
paṃca prakarāṇi atha asthi snāyu ūru saṃdhi ugra śiraḥ sva māṃsaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
kaṭīkataruṇa anvita aṃsa phalake tathā
nitaṃba sahitāni tāni amalina asthi marmāṇi alam
sa vasti vidhuraiḥ api su viṭapam tathā utkṣepakāḥ
kṣipreṇi api snāyu marmāṇi aśeṣāṇi uktāni ūrdhvam saṃdhi marmāṇi vakṣye
jānuni evam kūrpare gulpha sīmaṃta āvarta ākhyāḥ ca adhipena api atha anye
krakāṭikābhyām maṇibaṃdhakau tathā kukuṃdure marma maya ūru saṃdhayaḥ
apālaka ākhya sthapanī phaṇa stana pradhāna mūlāni api nīlamanyakā
śrṛṃgāṭa kāṣāṃga sirā adhimātṛkāḥ ca urvī bṛhatī ūrjita pārśvasaṃdhayaḥ
hṛd nābhi apastaṃbhaka lohitākṣakāḥ prāhuḥ śirā marma viśeṣa vedinaḥ
talahṛdaya iṃdravasti guda nāma yuta stanarohitāni api
prakaṭita māṃsa marma gaṇaḥ iti akhilam pratipāditam jinaiḥ
bahuvidha marma vid bhiṣaj aśeṣa vipakṣa ga roga lakṣaṇaiḥ
samucitam ācaret tat api paṃcavidham phalam atra marmaṇām
bhāva arthaḥ
prodyat kaṃṭha śirā gudaḥ hṛdaya vasti ukta ūru nābhyām sadā

original: sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi tānyadhipatiḥ śaṃkhau ca śrṛṃgāṭakaiḥ //
analyzed: sadyas prāṇa harāṇi tāni adhipatiḥ śaṃkhau ca śrṛṃgāṭakaiḥ
vakṣaḥ marma tala iṃdravasti sahitam kṣiprāṇi sīmaṃtakaiḥ

original: pārśve saṃdhiyugaṃ bṛhatyapi tathā ghnaṃtyeva kālāṃtarāt // 78 //
analyzed: pārśve saṃdhi yugam bṛhatī api tathā ghnaṃti eva kāla aṃtarāt
bhāva arthaḥ

original: utkṣepaḥ sthapanī ca marma suviśalyaghnānyataḥ prāṇināṃ /
analyzed: utkṣepaḥ sthapanī ca marma su viśalya ghnāni atas prāṇinām
rmanyābhyām sa phaṇe nitaṃba vidhure tad kūrparābhyām saha

original: krakāṭikābhyāṃ taruṇe ca marmaṇī bhavaṃti vaikalyakaraṇi kāraṇaiḥ /
analyzed: krakāṭikābhyām taruṇe ca marmaṇī bhavanti vaikalya karaṇi kāraṇaiḥ
rujā karāṇi aṣṭavidhāni dehinām
bhāva arthaḥ
sadyas prāṇa harāṇi tāni asu bhṛtām eka ūna sat viṃśatiḥ
kālāt striṃśat iha eka hīna vidhinā trīṇi eva śalya udgamāt
daṣṭau eva rujā karāṇi satatam marmāṇi saṃkhyānataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
pakṣāt marma abhighāta kṣata yuta manujāḥ vedanābhiḥ bhriyaṃte
sat vaidya prokta yukta ācaraṇa vividha bhaiṣajya vargaiḥ kadācid
bhavanti svara vikala tayā manmanāḥ gadgadāḥ ca
bhāva arthaḥ
rante viddham iha api madhyam ahatam pārśva abhisaṃghaṭṭitam
tad tad sthāna viśeṣataḥ prakurute sva ātma anurūpam phalam
tat brūyāt bhiṣaj atra moham apanīya āpta upadiṣṭa āgamāt
bhāva arthaḥ
śrī naṃdi ācāryāt aśeṣa āgama jñāt jñātvā doṣān doṣa jān ugra rogān
tad bhaiṣajya prakramam ca api sarvam prāṇāvādāt etat udhdṛtya nītam
bhāva arthaḥ
svāmi proktam viṣa ugra graha śamana vidhiḥ siddhasenaiḥ prasiddhaiḥ

original: kāye yā sā cikitsā daśarathagurubhirmeghanādaiḥ śiśūnāṃ /
analyzed: kāye yā sā cikitsā daśaratha gurubhiḥ meghanādaiḥ śiśūnām

original: vaidyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca divyāmṛtamapi kathitaṃ siṃha
analyzed: vaidyam vṛṣyam ca divya amṛtam api kathitam siṃha
nādaiḥ muni iṃdraiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
iti ka pustake
aṣṭāṃgam api akhilam atra samaṃta bhadraiḥ proktam sa vistara vacaḥ vibhavaiḥ viśeṣāt
saṃkṣepataḥ nigaditam tat iha ātma śaktyā kalyāṇa kārakam aśeṣa padārtha yuktam
bhāva arthaḥ
veṃgīṣa trika liṃga deśa janana prastutya sānu utkaṭa
prodyat vṛkṣa latā vitāna nirate siddhaiḥ sa vidyādharaiḥ
sarvaiḥ maṃdara kandara upama guhā caitya ālaya alaṃkṛte

original: ramye rāmagirau mayā viracitaṃ śāstraṃ hitaṃ prāṇinām // 87 //
analyzed: ramye rāmagirau mayā viracitam śāstram hitam prāṇinām
bhāva arthaḥ
ti aharniśam anusmarāmi akhila karma nirmūlanam
bhāva arthaḥ
ārogya śāstram adhigamya muniḥ vipaścit
sbāsthyam sa sādhayati siddha sukha eka hetum
anyaḥ sva doṣa kṛta roga nipīḍita aṃgaḥ
badhnāti karma nija duṣpariṇāma bhedāt
bhāva arthaḥ

original: na dharmasya kartā na cārthasya hartā na kāmasya bhoktā na mokṣasya pātā /
analyzed: na dharmasya kartā na ca arthasya hartā na kāmasya bhoktā na mokṣasya pātā

original: naro buddhimān dhīrasatvo'pi rogī yatastadvināśādbhavennaiva martyaḥ // 90 //
analyzed: naraḥ buddhimān dhīra sattvaḥ api rogī yatas tad vināśāt bhavet na eva martyaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
iti ugra āditya ācārya varya praṇītam śāstram śastram karmaṇām marma bhedī
jñātvā martyaiḥ sarva karma pravīṇaiḥ labhyaṃta eke dharma kāma artha mokṣāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
sat davya udbhāsamāna sphuṭatara mahitaḥ sevyamānaḥ viśiṣṭaiḥ
vīryaiḥ ārājitaiḥ ūrjita nija caritaḥ jaina mārga upamānaḥ
āyurvedaḥ sa loka vrata vidhiḥ akhila prāṇi niḥśreyasa artham
stheyāt ācaṃdratāram jinapati vihita aśeṣa tatva artha sāram
bhāva arthaḥ
bhūyāt dhātrī samastā cirataram atula ati utsava udbhāsamānā
jīyāt dharmaḥ jinasya pravimala vilasat bhavya satva eka dhāma
pāyāt rāja adhirājaḥ sakala vasumatīm jaina mārga anuraktaḥ
stheyāt jaina iṃdra vaidyam śubha karam akhila prāṇinām mānyam etat
bhāva arthaḥ
iti jina vaktra nirgata su śāstra mahā aṃbunidheḥ
sakala pada artha vistṛta taraṃga kula ākulataḥ
nisṛtam idam hi śīkara nibham jagat eka hitam
bhāva arthaḥ
iti ugrāditya ācārya viracite kalyāṇakārake cikitsā adhikāre
śāstrasaṃgrahataṃtrayuktiḥ iti nāma viṃśaḥ paricchedaḥ
śrīmat vīra jineṃdram iṃdra mahitam vaṃdyam muni iṃdraiḥ sadā

original: natvā tatvavidāṃ manoharataraṃ sāraṃ paraṃ prāṇināṃ //
analyzed: natvā tatva vidām manoharataram sāram param prāṇinām
syāt taṃtra uttaram uttamam pratipadam vakṣye niruddha uttaram
bhāva arthaḥ
ukta anukta padārtha śeṣam akhilam saṃgṛhya sarva ātmanā

original: vaktuṃ sarvavidā praṇītamadhikaṃ ko vā samarthaḥ pumān //
analyzed: vaktum sarva vidā praṇītam adhikam kaḥ vā samarthaḥ pumān
iti evam su vicārya varjitam api prārabdha śāstram budhaiḥ
pāram sat puruṣaḥ prayāti aramataḥ vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
sthānam rāmagiriḥ giri iṃdra sadṛśaḥ sarva artha siddhi pradam
śrī naṃdiprabhava ukhila āgama vidhiḥ śikṣā pradaḥ sarvadā
prāṇāvāya nirūpita artham akhilam sarvajña saṃbhāṣitam

original: sāmagrīguṇatā hi siddhimadhunā śāstraṃ svayaṃ nānyathā // 3 //
analyzed: sāmagrī guṇa tā hi siddhim adhunā śāstram svayam nā anyathā
bhāva arthaḥ
teṣām teṣu viśeṣataḥ ūrtha kathanam śrotavyam eva anyathā
śāstrasya ati mahat tvam artha vaśataḥ śrotuḥ manaḥ mohanam
vyākhyātum ca bhavet aśeṣa vacanasya adarthataḥ saṃkaraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
tasmāt vaidyam udāharāmi niyatam bahu artham artha āvaham

original: vaidyaṃ nāma cikitsitaṃ na tu punaḥ vidyodbhavārthāṃtaram //
analyzed: vaidyam nāma cikitsitam na tu punar vidyā udbhava artha aṃtaram
vyākhyānāt avagamyate ṛtha kathanam saṃdehavat vastu tat
sāmānyeṣu viśeṣitaḥ sthitam atas padmam yathā paṃkajam
bhāva arthaḥ
s tatra ekena su karmaṇā su vihitena api āmayaḥ sādhyate
dvābhyām kaścid iha tribhiḥ gurutaraḥ kaścid caturbhiḥ sadā
sādhya asādhya vid atra sādhanatamam jñātvā bhiṣak sādhayet
bhāva arthaḥ
teṣām eva su karmaṇām su vihitānām api upekṣā kriyā
sva jñānāt athavā āturasya viṣama ācārāt bhiṣaj mohataḥ
kalyāt atra bhavanti saṃtata mahā saṃtāpa kṛt vyāpadaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
cchiṃṣṭān śiṣṭa jana priyān rasa mahābaṃdha prabaṃdhān atas
kalpān kalpa kulaupa
nalpaiḥ śloka gaṇaiḥ bracīmi nitarām āyuṣkarān śaṃpradān
bhāva arthaḥ
yāthāsaṃkhya vidhānataḥ kṛta mahā karma udbhava vyāpadam

original: vakṣye cāru cikitsitaṃ prathamataḥ kṣārādhikāraḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: vakṣye cāru cikitsitam prathamatas kṣāra adhikāraḥ smṛtaḥ
śastreṣu ugra mahā upaśaṃstra nicaye kṣāra pradhānam tathā
dattaḥ tad kṣaṇanāt tatas kṣaraṇataḥ kṣāraḥ yam iti ādṛtaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
kṣāraḥ iyam pravisāraṇa ātma viṣayaḥ pānīyaḥ iti eva vā
kṣārasya dvividhaḥ vipāka vaśataḥ svalpa drava uti dravaḥ
kuja upamān api iti pāṭha aṃtaram
kṣāra dravya gaṇaiḥ ca tat dahanataḥ śaktiḥ samāpyāyayet
bhāva arthaḥ
vyādhau kṣāra nipātane kṣaṇam atas kṛṣṇa tvam ālokya tat
kṣāram kṣīra ghṛta amla yaṣṭi madhukaiḥ sauvīrakaiḥ kṣālayet
paścāt kṣāra nivartanāt anudinam śīta anna pāna ādibhiḥ
śītaiḥ api anulepanaiḥ praśamayet tam kṣāra sādhya āturam
bhāva arthaḥ
ślakṣṇaḥ śuklatara ati picchila sukha grāhya ulpa ruj vyāpakaḥ
kṣāraḥ syāt aguṇavān anena satatam kṣāreṇa varjyāḥ ime
śiśumat a klāṃta ati vṛddhāḥ api
pumān
marma snāyu sirā ati komala nakha asthi akṣi alpa māṃsa praṃdaḥ
tastrotasu api marma roga sahiteṣu āhāra vidveṣiṣu

original: sīvanyāmudareṣu saṃdhiṣu gale nābhau tathā mehane /
analyzed: sīvanyām udareṣu saṃdhiṣu gale nābhau tathā mehane

kṣāraḥ iyam viṣa śastra sarpa dahana jvālā aśani prakhyayā
syāt ajñāni niyojitaḥ su bhiṣajā hanyāt niyuktaḥ gadān
bhāva arthaḥ
vyāpārāt adhikam prayoga vaśataḥ śastra anuśastreṣu api
nāḍyām nyaccha bhagaṃdara krimi viṣe bāhye tu yojyāt sadā
saptasu api adhijihvikā upayuta jihvāyām ca
vaidarbhe bahu medasā api upahate oṣṭha prakopam tathā
yojyaḥ syāt iha rohiṇīṣu tisṛṣu kṣāraḥ gareṣu ūrjitaḥ
pānīyaḥ upi udareṣu gulma nicaye syāt agni saṃṅgeṣu api
aśmaryām api śarkarāsu vividha graṃthiṣu atha arśasu api
svāṃtaḥ tīvra viṣa krimiṣu api tathā śvāseṣu kāseṣu api
prodyat bhāsiṣu ca api ajīrṇiṣu mataḥ kṣāraḥ yam asmāt api
kṣārāt agniḥ atīva tīkṣṇa guṇa bat tad dagdha nirmūlanāt
bhāva arthaḥ
kṣāraiḥ api ati bheṣajaiḥ niśita sat śastraiḥ aśakyāḥ tu ye
rogāḥ tān api sādhayet atha sirā snāyu asthi saṃdhiṣu api
na eva agniḥ pratisevyate dahana sat karma upayogyān api
dravyāṇi asthi samasta loha śara kāṃḍa sneha piṇḍa ādayaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
kam kṛtvā ātyayikāmayā iti vidhivat śīta drava āhāriṇaḥ
sarveṣu api ṛtuṣu prayoga vaśataḥ kurvīta dāha kriyām
tat dagdham dvividham bhiṣaj vinihitam tvac māṃsa dagdha kramāt
bhāva arthaḥ
kocaḥ ca ati vidāha tā pracura durgaṃdha ati tīvra ūṣma tā
māṃse pi alpa ruj alpa śopha sahita śyāma tva saṃkoca tā
śuṣka tva vraṇa tā bhavet iti matam saṃkṣepam sat lakṣaṇaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
geṣu api ārdra dukūla saṃvṛtam atha āhi ā romakūpāt bhṛśam
vāthau ugratare vraṇeṣu kaṭhina prodbhūta māṃseṣu ca
granthau arbuda carmakīla tila kāla ākhyā paceṣu api alam
ttau satyām dahana kriyā prakaṭitā naṣṭa aṣṭa karmā aribhiḥ
samyak dagdham avekṣya sādhu nipuṇaḥ kuryāt ghṛta abhyaṃjanam
śīta āhāra vihāra bheṣaja vidhim vidvān vidadhyāt sadā
bhāva arthaḥ
varjyāḥ vanhi vidhānataḥ prakṛti pittaḥ ca ati bhinna udaraḥ
kṣīṇa uṃtar paripūrṇa śoṇita yutaḥ śrāṃtaḥ sa śalyaḥ ca yaḥ
a
svedyāḥ ca narāḥ bahu vraṇa gaṇaiḥ saṃpīḍitāḥ ca anyathā
dagdhasya api pratipadam vakṣyāmi sat lakṣaṇaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: gdhaṃ cettatra caturvidhaṃ hyabhihitaṃ teṣāṃ yathānukramāt //
analyzed: ced tatra caturvidham hi abhihitam teṣām yathā anukramāt
vakṣye lakṣaṇam api anūna vara bhaiṣajva kriyām ca ātura
sya āhāra ādi vidhānam api anumatam mānyaiḥ jineṃdraiḥ sadā
avyadhyāḥ iti pāṭha aṃtaram
bhāva arthaḥ
tyanyat yat tila varṇam uṣṇam adhikam na eva atigāḍham sthitam
tāpāt duḥkhataram cira praśamanam durdagdha tā lakṣaṇam
mūrcchā vā ati tṛṣā ca saṃdhi viguru tvam ca aṃga saṃśoṣaṇam
māṃsānām avalaṃbanam nija sirā snāyu asthi saṃpīḍanam
kālāt sa krimiḥ eva rohati cira ārūḍhā uti durvarṇa tā
syāt atyaṃta vidagva lakṣaṇam idam vakṣye cikitsām api
bhāva arthaḥ
snigdham rūkṣam api prapadya dahanaḥ śīghram dahati adbhutam
tatra eva adhika vedanā vividha visphoṭa ādayaḥ syuḥ sadā

original: jñātvā spṛṣṭamihāgninā tu sahasā tenaiva saṃtāpanaṃ /
analyzed: jñātvā spṛṣṭam iha agninā tu sahasā tena eva saṃtāpanam
sa uṣṇaiḥ uṣṇa guṇa auṣadhaiḥ iha muhur samyak pradehaḥ śubhaḥ
ise graṃtha aṃtara meṃ
pluṣṭa

bhāva arthaḥ

original: rgaiḥ vā gairikayā tugāsahitayā vā lepayedādarāt // 28 //
analyzed: vā gairikayā tugā sahitayā vā lepayet ādarāt
bhāva arthaḥ
durdagdhe api sukha uṣṇa dugdha pariṣekaiḥ ājya saṃmrakṣaṇaiḥ
śītaiḥ api anulepanaiḥ upacaret sphoṭān api sphoṭayet
sphoṭān sa sphuṭitān atas ghṛta yutaiḥ śīta auṣadhaiḥ śītalaiḥ
patraiḥ vā parisaṃvṛtān api bhiṣaj kuryāt su śīta ādṛtim
bhāva arthaḥ
jñātvā śītala saṃvidhānam adhikam kṛtvā atidagdhe bhiṣa
gmāṃsāni api avalaṃvitān apaharet snāyu ādikāni api alam
duṣṭa aduṣṭam apohyam evam akhilam kṣīreṇa vā kṣālayet
patraiḥ vā vṛṇuyāt vraṇam vanaruhaiḥ kuryāt avraṇa ukta kriyām
bhāva arthaḥ
tad dagdha vraṇa ropaṇe api su kṛte cūrṇa prayoga arhake
kāle kṣāmam apeyuṣaiḥ amaliṃnaiḥ śāli akṣataiḥ lākṣayā
ba tvagbhiḥ ca su cūrṇitābhiḥ asakṛt saṃcūrṇayet nirṇayam
bhāva arthaḥ
śvitreṣu ukta vicitra varṇa karaṇa aneka auṣadha ālepanam
kuryāt snigdha manojña śītalatara sva āhāram āhārayet
proktam ca agni vidhānam etat akhilam vakṣyāmi śastrakriyām
śastrāṇām anuśastra śastra vidhinā śastram dvidhā coditam
bhāva arthaḥ
tatra ādau anuśastra bhedam akhilam vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepataḥ
kṣāra agni sphaṭikā urasāra nakha kāca tvac jalūkā ādibhiḥ
teṣu api auṣadha bhīru rāja vanitā vāla ati vṛddha ādikān
dravya prāya guṇā mahā sukha karī proktā jalūkā kriyā
bhāva arthaḥ
vātena api ati pitta duṣṭam athavā sa śleṣmaṇā śoṇitam
śrṛṃgeṇa atra jalaukasā sa dahanena alābunā nirharet

analyzed: pītvā tām patitām ca śoṇitam atas saṃkuḍikena

analyzed: kṣīreṇa eva ghṛtena vā cirataram samyak niṣicya kramāt
kṣauma mayībhiḥ api atitaram śuṣkaiḥ tu saṃstaṃbhayet  /

lodhraiḥ śuddhataraiḥ su gomaya mayaiḥ godhūma dhātrī phalaiḥ
śaṃkhaiḥ śukti gaṇa arimeda taru saṃpūteḥ tathā graṃthibhiḥ
vraṇam āśu baṃdhana balaiḥ saṃstaṃbhayet śoṇitam
bhāva arthaḥ

iti evam hi anuśasra śāstram adhikam samyak vinirdeśataḥ

analyzed: cchīghram yatra rujā bhavet atitarām tatra eva śalyam haret

original: sūcī vā suvicārya sīvanavidhau ṛjvīṃ savakrāṃ tayā /

sīvet ūru śiraḥ pratīta jaṭhare saṃbhūya bhūri vraṇe
pīḍya utpīḍana bheṣajaiḥ api bahis saṃropaṇaiḥ ropayet  /
bhāva arthaḥ
chedya ādiṣu api ca aṣṭa karmasu yadā yad karma kartuḥ bhiṣak
vāṃchan bheṣaja yaṃtra śastra gṛha śīta uṣṇa udaka agni adikān
snigdhān sat paricārakān api tadā saṃyojya saṃpūrṇa tām
jñātvā yogyam api iha bhojanam api prāk bhojayet āturam
bhāva arthaḥ
śmaryām api ati yatnataḥ bhiṣaj iha prakhyāta śastrakriyām
kuryāt āśu tathā aśmarīm iha guda dvārāt bahis vāmatas
chitvā arśaḥ vidhi yaṃtritasya śabaraiḥ saṃhārayet vāribhiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
snigdha svinnam iha āturam su vihitam yogya kriyā yaṃtritam

original: jñātvā tasya sirāṃ tadā taducitaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā sphuṭam //
analyzed: jñātvā tasya sirām tadā tat ucitam śastram gṛhītvā sphuṭam
vidhvā asṛj parimokṣa
yet atitarām dhārā nipāta kramāt
alpam baṃdhana balāt saṃstaṃbhayet śoṇitam
bhāva arthaḥ
ccheṣam saṃśamanaiḥ jayet atitarām raktam sirā nirgatam
vāpa yet iti pāṭha aṃtaram
kuryāt vāta rujam kṣaya śvasana sat kāsa ādya hikkā ādikān
pāṇḍu unmāda śiraḥ abhitāpam acirāt mṛtyum samāpādayet  /
bhāva arthaḥ

original: rakte'tiprasṛtakṣaṇe hyupaśamaṃ kṛtvā tu gavyaṃ tadā /
analyzed: rakta iti prasṛta kṣaṇe hi upaśamam kṛtvā tu gavyam tadā
dravyaiḥ siddham iha uṣṇa śīta śamanam saṃdīpanam bhojayet
bhāva arthaḥ
dhāram sa ujvala varṇa puṣṭiṃjananam śiṣṭaḥ bhiṣaj rakṣayet

original: mārogyaṃ laghutāṃ tanośca manasaḥ saumyaṃ dṛḍhātmeṃdriyam // 61 //
analyzed: mā ārogyam laghu tām tanoḥ ca manasaḥ saumyam dṛḍha ātma iṃdriyam
bhāva arthaḥ
vātena ati asitam sa phenam aruṇam svaccham su śīghra āgamam
duṣṭam syāt rudhiram sva pitta kupitam nīla ati pīta asitam
visram na iṣṭam aśeṣa kīṭa maśakaiḥ tat makṣikābhiḥ sadā
śleṣma udreka kalaṃkitam tu bahalam ca atyantam āpicchilam
māṃsa ābhāsam api kṣaṇāt aticirāt āgacchati śleṣmaṇā
śītam gairika saprabham ca sahajam syāt iṃdragopa upamam
tat ca atyantam asaṃhatam hi aviralam vaivarṇa hīnam sadā
dṛṣṭvā jīva mayam ca śoṇita malam saṃrakṣayet akṣayam
bhāva arthaḥ

original: nāsvinne snigdharūkṣe na ca bahuvirasāhāramāhārite vā //
