original: śītaṃ toyaṃ ca pītaṃ rudhiramapaharettasya taṃ tadviditvā // 64 //
analyzed: śītam toyam ca pītam rudhiram apaharet tasya tam tat viditvā
bhāva arthaḥ
varjyāḥ te sṛj pramokṣaiḥ śvasana kasana śoṣa jvara adhva śrama ārtāḥ
kṣīṇāḥ rūkṣāḥ kṣata aṃgāḥ śuddha dehāḥ
strī vyāpāra upavāsaiḥ kṣapita tanu latā kṣepakaiḥ pakṣaghātaiḥ
garbhiṇyaḥ kṣīṇa retaḥ gara yuta manujāḥ atyaye srāvayet tān
bhāva arthaḥ
iti jina vaktra nirgata su śāstra mahā aṃbunidheḥ
sakala padārtha vistṛta taraṃga kula ākulataḥ
nisṛtam idam hi śīkara nibham jagat eka hitam
bhāva arthaḥ
iti ugrāditya ācārya viracite kalyāṇakārake uttara taṃtra adhikāre
karmacikitsitam nāma prathamaḥ āditaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
atha ājya pāna ādya svila auṣadha kriyā krameṣu rogāḥ prabhavanti dehinām
bhiṣaj viśeṣa āhita mohataḥ api vā tathā ātura anātma
tayā apacārataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: ghṛtasya pānaṃ puruṣasya sarvadā rasāyanaṃ sādhuniyojitaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ghṛtasya pānam puruṣasya sarvadā rasāyanam sādhu niyojitam bhavet
tat eva doṣa āvaha kāraṇam nṛṇām ayogataḥ vā api athavā atiyogataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
ghṛte ipi ajīrṇe prabhavanti arocaka jvara prameha unmada kuṣṭha mūrcchanāḥ

original: ataḥ piveduṣṇajalaṃ sasaiṃdhavaṃ sukhāṃbhasā vāpyatha vāmayedbhiṣak // 4 //
analyzed: atas pivet uṣṇa jalam sa saiṃdhavam sukha aṃbhasā vā api atha vāmayet bhiṣak  /
bhāva arthaḥ
yadā śarīram manaḥ vacaḥ mūtra purīṣa mārutaḥ
pravṛttiḥ udgāra viśuddhiḥ indriya prasanna tā hi ujvala jīrṇa lakṣaṇam
bhāva arthaḥ
tatas ca kustuṃburu niṃba sādhitam pibet yavāgūm athavā anudoṣataḥ
kulattha mudga āḍhaka yūṣa sat khalaiḥ laghu uṣṇam annam vitaret yathocitam
bhāva arthaḥ

original: svayaṃ narasnehanatatparo ghṛtaṃ tilodbhavaṃ vā kramavarddhitaṃ pivet /
analyzed: svayam nara snehana tatparaḥ ghṛtam tila udbhavam vā krama varddhitam pivet
tri paṃca sapta aham iha prayatnataḥ tatas tu sātmyam prabhava unniṣevitam
bhāva arthaḥ

original: pivedghṛtaṃ śarkarayā ca paittike sasaiṃdhavaṃ soṣṇajalaṃ ca vātike //
analyzed: pivet ghṛtam śarkarayā ca paittike sa saiṃdhavam sa uṣṇa jalam ca vātike

original: kaṭutrikakṣārayutaṃ kaphātmike krameṇa roge prabhavaṃti tadvidaḥ // 8 //
analyzed: kaṭutrika kṣāra yutam kapha ātmike krameṇa roge prabhavanti tad vidaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: naro yadi kleśaparo balādhikaḥ sthirassvayaṃ snehaparo'tiśītale //
analyzed: naraḥ yadi kleśa paraḥ bala adhikaḥ sthiraḥ svayam sneha para uti śītale

original: pivedṛtau kevalameva tadghṛtaṃ sadācchapānaṃ hi hitaṃ hitaiṣiṇām // 9 //
analyzed: pivet ṛtau kevalam eva tat ghṛtam sadā accha pānam hi hitam hita eṣiṇām
bhāva arthaḥ

original: kiyatpramāṇaṃ parimāṇameti tadghṛṃta tu pītaṃ divasasya madhyataḥ //
analyzed: kiyat pramāṇam parimāṇam eti tat ghṛṃta tu pītam divasasya madhyatas
mada klama glāni vidāha mūrcchana ati arocaka abhāvataḥ eva śobhanam  /
bhāva arthaḥ
mṛdum śiśum sthūlam atīva durbalam pipāsum ājya dviṣam ati arocakam
su dāha deham su vidhāna tādṛśam sabhaktam eva atra ghṛtam prapāyayet  /
bhāva arthaḥ
sa pippalī saiṃdhava mastuka anvitam ghṛtam pibet raukṣya nivāraṇam param

original: saśarkarājyaṃ payasaiva vā sukham payo yavāgūmathavālpataṇḍulām // 12 //
analyzed: sa śarkarā ājyam payasā eva vā sukham payaḥ yavāgūm athavā alpa taṇḍulām

original: sitāsitājyaiḥ pariduhya dohanaṃ prapāya raukṣyātparimucyate naraḥ //
analyzed: sita asita ājyaiḥ pariduhya dohanam prapāya raukṣyāt parimucyate naraḥ
kulattha kola amla payaḥ dadhi dravaiḥ vipakvam api āśu ghṛtam ghṛtottamam
bhāva arthaḥ
nṛ
vṛddheṣu abala abaleṣu ca prabhūta tāpa agniṣu ca alpa doṣiṣu
bhiṣaj vidadhyāt iha saṃprakīrtitān kṣaṇāt api snehana yoga sattamān
bhāva arthaḥ

original: purīṣamatyaṃtanirūkṣitaṃ ghanaṃ nireti kṛcchrānna ca bhuktamapyalam //
analyzed: purīṣam atyaṃta nirūkṣitam ghanam nireti kṛcchrāt na ca bhuktam api alam
vipākam āyāti vidahyate hi uraḥ vivarṇa gātra inila pūrita udaraḥ
su durbalaḥ syāt ati durbala agnimān virūkṣita aṃgaḥ bhavati iha mānavaḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ snigdhatanossulakṣaṇam bravīmi saṃkṣepata eva taṇchruṇu // 16 //
analyzed: tatas param snigdha tanoḥ su lakṣaṇam bravīmi saṃkṣepataḥ eva tat śruṇu
bhāva arthaḥ
vṛṣeṣu

original: iti pāṭhāṃtaram / isakā artha jo dharmātmāhaiṃ aryāt śāṃtasvabhāvavāle haiṃ aisā hogā
analyzed: iti pāṭha aṃtaram isakā artha jaḥ dharma ātmā haiṃ aryāt śāṃta svabhāva vāle haiṃ aisā hogā
paraṃtu prakaraṇa meṃ
nṛpeṣu

original: yaha pāṭha saṃgata māluma hotā hai / saṃ.
analyzed: yaha pāṭha saṃgata māluma hotā hai saṃ
avaśya sa sneha mala pravartanam ghṛta iti vidveṣaḥ iha aṃga sādanam
bhavet ca su nigdha viśeṣa lakṣaṇam tathā adhika snehana lakṣaṇam bruve
bhāva arthaḥ
gude vidāha uti mala pravṛttiḥ api arocakaiḥ hi ānanataḥ kapha udgamaḥ
pravāhikā atyaṃga vidāha mohanam bhavet ati snigdha narasya lakṣaṇam
bhāva arthaḥ
sa nāgaram sa uṣṇa jalam pibet asau samudga yūṣa odanam āśu dāpayet
saha ajamodā agnika saiṃdhava anvitā amalām yavāgūm athavā prayojayet
bhāva arthaḥ

original: ghṛtaṃ manohāri rasāyanaṃ nṛṇāmiti prayatnādiha tatpibaṃti ye //
analyzed: ghṛtam manohāri rasāyanam nṛṇām iti prayatnāt iha tat pibaṃti ye
sadā eva teṣām ahima udakam hitam hitā yavāgūḥ ahima alpa taṇḍulā
bhāva arthaḥ
sneha udbhava āmaya gaṇān upaśamya yatnāt
sveda udbhava āmaya yutam vidhiḥ ucyate itas
svedaḥ nṛṇām hitatamaḥ bhuvi sarvathā iti
saṃyojayati api ca tatra bhavanti rogāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: samyakprayogavaśato vahavo hi rogāḥ śāmyaṃti yoga iha cāpyatiyogato vā /
analyzed: samyak prayoga vaśataḥ vahavaḥ hi rogāḥ śāmyaṃti yoge iha ca api atiyogataḥ vā
nānāvidha āmaya gaṇā tasmāt
bhāva arthaḥ
tāpa ūṣma baṃdhana mahā drava bhedataḥ tu svedaḥ caturvidhaḥ iti
vastra agni pāṇi tala tāpanam eva tāpaḥ sa uṣṇa iṣṭakā upala ku dhānya gaṇaiḥ tathā ūṣmā
bhāva arthaḥ
uṣṇa auṣadhaiḥ api vipācita pāyasa ādyaiḥ patra aṃbara āvaraṇakaiḥ iha baṃdhana ākhyaḥ
sauvīraka aṃbu ghṛta taila payobhiḥ uṣṇaiḥ svedaḥ bhavet atitarām drava nāmadheyaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: vyāmiśrite maruti cāpi kaphe hitaṃ tat sasnehadehahitakṛddahatīha rūkṣam // 25 //
analyzed: vyāmiśrite maruti ca api kaphe hitam tat sa sneha deha hita kṛt dahati iha rūkṣam
bhāva arthaḥ

original: vātādayassatatameva hi dhātusaṃsthāḥ snehaprayogavaśataḥ svata eva līnāḥ /
analyzed: vāta ādayaḥ satatam eva hi dhātu saṃsthāḥ sneha prayoga vaśataḥ svatas eva līnāḥ
svedaiḥ drava tvam upagamya yathākrameṇa svasthāḥ bhavanti udara gāḥ sva nivāsa niṣṭhāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
svedaiḥ iha agniḥ abhivṛddhim upaiti nityam svedaḥ kapha anila mahā āmaya nāśa hetuḥ
prasveva dam āśu janayati ati rūkṣa dehe śīta arthi tām api ca sādhu niyojitā usau
bhāva arthaḥ
svedaḥ prakopayati pittam asṛk ca sākṣāt visphoṭana bhrama mada jvara dāha mūrcchāḥ

original: kṣipraṃ samāvahati tīvrataraḥ prayuktaḥ tatrātiśītalavidhiṃ vidadhīta dhīmān //
analyzed: kṣipram samāvahati tīvrataraḥ prayuktaḥ tatra ati śītala vidhim vidadhīta dhīmān
bhāva arthaḥ
pā
na atipāta mada dāha parīta deham śīta aṃbu biṃdubhiḥ ajasram iha ardita aṃgam
uṣṇa aṃbunā snapitam ujvalita udara agnim saṃbhojayet agurum agni karam drava annam
bhāva arthaḥ
sveda kriyām abhividhāya yathākrameṇa saṃśodhana udbhava mahā āmaya sat cikitsā
samyak vidhāna vidhinā atra vidhāsyate tad saṃbaṃdhi bheṣaja nibaṃdhana siddha yogaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: do tīna pratiyomeṃ bhī yahī pāṭha milatā hai / paraṃtu yaha prakaraṇa se kucha visaṃgata māluma hotā
analyzed: bhī yahī pāṭha milatā hai paraṃtu yaha prakaraṇa se kucha visaṃgata māluma hotā

original: hai / yahāṃpara svedakamekā prakaraṇa hai, isaliye yahāṃpara prāṇātipāta yaha pāṭha adhika saṃgata mālūma hotā
analyzed: hai yahāṃpara prakaraṇa hai isaliye yahāṃpara prāṇātipāta yaha pāṭha adhika saṃgata mālūma hotā

original: hai / arthāt svedakarmameṃ atiyogase utpanna ūpara ke ślokameṃ kathita rogoṃkī prāṇātipāta avasthāmeṃ kyā
analyzed: hai arthāt sveda karma atiyogase utpanna ūpara śloka meṃ kathita roga prāṇātipāta avasthāmeṃ kyā

original: kareṃ isakā isa ślokameṃ vidhāna kiyā hogā / saṃbhava hai ki lekhaka ke hastadoṣase yaha pāṭhabheda ho gayā
analyzed: kareṃ isakā isa śloka meṃ vidhāna kiyā hogā saṃbhava hai ki lekhaka ke hasta doṣase yaha pāṭhabheda ho gayā
kṣīṇāḥ tu doṣāḥ paribṛṃhaṇīyāḥ samyak praśamyāḥ calitāḥ ca sarve

original: svasthāḥ surakṣyāḥ satataṃ pravṛddhāḥ sadyo viśodhyā iti siddhasenaiḥ // 31 //
analyzed: svasthāḥ su rakṣyāḥ satatam pravṛddhāḥ sadyas viśodhyāḥ iti siddhasenaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
saṃśodhane tat vamanam virekaḥ samyak prasiddhau iti sādhu siddhaiḥ
siddhāṃta mārga bhihitau tayoḥ tat vakṣyāmahe yat vamanam viśeṣāt
bhāva arthaḥ
śvas ham yathāvat vamanam kariṣyāmi ittham viciṃtya eva tathā aparāṇhe
saṃbhojayet āturam āśu dhīmān saṃbhojanīyān api saṃpravakṣye
bhāva arthaḥ
ye tu utkaṭa udyat bahu doṣa duṣṭāḥ tīkṣṇa agnayaḥ satva bala pradhānāḥ
ye te mahā vyādhi gṛhīta dehāḥ saṃmojanīyāḥ bhuvana pravīṇaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
tatra aparedyus pravibhajya kāle sādhāraṇe prātar avekṣya mātrām

original: kalkaiḥ kaṣāyairapi cūrṇayogaiḥ snehādibhirvā khalu vāmayettān // 35 //
analyzed: kalkaiḥ kaṣāyaiḥ api cūrṇa yogaiḥ sneha ādibhiḥ vā khalu vāmayet tān
bhāva arthaḥ
durgaṃdha durdarśana dussvarūpaiḥ vībhatsa sātmya itara bheṣajaiḥ ca
saṃyukta yogān vamane prayuktaḥ manoharaiḥ tu
bhāva arthaḥ
bāla ati vṛddha auṣadha bhīru nārī daurbalya yuktān api sa dravaiḥ taiḥ
kṣīra ādibhiḥ bheṣaja maṃgala āḍhayam tān pāyayitvā
payettān
bhāva arthaḥ
vāmayet iti pāṭha aṃtaram
hṛllāsa lālā sṛtim āśu dhīmān ālokya pīṭha upari sanniviṣṭaḥ
gandharvahasta utpala patra vṛntaiḥ vega udbhava artham pramṛśet sva kaṇṭham
bhāva arthaḥ
sā uyam pravṛtta auṣadha sat balāse pitta inu yāte hṛdaya ūru koṣṭhe

original: śuddhe laghau kāyamanovikāre samyaksthite śleṣmaṇi suṣṭuvāṃtaḥ // 39 //
analyzed: śuddhe laghau kāya manaḥ vikāre samyak sthite śleṣmaṇi
bhāva arthaḥ
sa nasya gaṇḍūṣa vilocana aṃjana dravaiḥ viśodhya āśu śiraḥ balāsam
uṣṇa aṃbubhiḥ dhautam iha aparāṇhe tam bhojayet yūṣa gaṇaiḥ yathāvat
bhāva arthaḥ

original: evaṃ saṃśamane kṛte kaphakṛtā rogā vinaśyaṃti te /
analyzed: evam saṃśamane kṛte kapha kṛtāḥ rogāḥ vinaśyaṃti te
tad mūla upahṛte kaphe jalaja saṃghātāḥ yathā hi aṃbhasi
dvāmya prāpti niṣedha śāstram akhilam jñātvā bhiṣaj bhepajaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
dūrdhvam śuddhatarasya śodhanam adhas kuryāt bhiṣaj na anyathā

original: cchannāgniṃ sahasaiva roganicayaḥ prāpnoti martyaṃ sadā // 42 //
analyzed: channa agnim sahasā eva roga nicayaḥ prāpnoti martyam sadā
bhāva arthaḥ
snigdha svinna suvāṃtam ātura maram vireka auṣadhaiḥ
samyak tam su virecayāmi alam iti prāk eva pūrva aṇhataḥ
siddha uṣṇa udaka pānam api anugatam dadyāt mala drāvakam
bhāva arthaḥ
anyedyus su vicārya jīrṇam aśanam sūrye ca nirlohite
dadyāt auṣadham agnim alpa paruṣa vyādhi krama ālocanaiḥ

original: koṣṭhaḥ syāttrividho mṛduḥ kaṭhina ityanyopi madhyastathā /
analyzed: koṣṭhaḥ syāt trividhaḥ mṛduḥ kaṭhinaḥ iti anyaḥ api madhyaḥ tathā
picena ati marut kaphena nikhilaiḥ doṣaiḥ samaiḥ madhyamaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: mṛdvī syādiha sanmṛdāvatitarāṃ krūre ca tīṣṇā matā /
analyzed: mṛdvī syāt iha sat mṛdau atitarām krūre ca tīṣṇā matā

original: madhyākhye'pi tathaiva sādhunipuṇairmadhyā tu mātrā kṛtā //
analyzed: madhya ākhye api tathā eva sādhu nipuṇaiḥ madhyā tu mātrā kṛtā
aprāptam balataḥ malaṃgama yutam na icchet sa pitta auṣadham

original: prāptaṃ vāpi na vārayedatitarāṃ vegaṃ vighātāvaham // 45 //
analyzed: prāptam vā api na vārayet atitarām vegam vighāta āvaham
bhāva arthaḥ
yāsyanti kramatas marut jala malā pitta auṣadha udyat kaphāḥ
yāteṣu eṣu tatas nila anugamane samyak viriktaḥ bhavet

original: soyaṃ śuddhatanuḥ śramaklamayuto laghvī tanuṃ codvahan /
analyzed: sā uyam śuddha tanuḥ śrama klama yutaḥ laghvī tanum ca udvahan
saṃtuṣṭa ūti pipāsuḥ agni balavān kṣīṇaḥ yavāgūm pibet
bhāva arthaḥ

original: kto vā {??} na caiva nipuṇaḥ śaktyā ca yuktyā pibet //
analyzed: ktaḥ vā na ca eva nipuṇaḥ śaktyā ca yuktyā pibet

original: vāṃtasyāpi virecitasya ca guṇāḥ prāgeva saṃkīrtitā /
analyzed: vāṃtasya api virecitasya ca guṇāḥ prāk eva saṃkīrtitā
doṣa guṇān niṣedha vidhinā budhvā vidadhyāt budhaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
yaḥ saṃśodhana bheṣajam tat adhikam taikṣṇa uṣṇa saukṣmya ātmakam
ti ūrdhvam yāti avipakvam eva vamanam samyak guṇa udrekataḥ
pītam tat ca vipacyamānam asakṛt yāyāt adhas bhāgitam
bhāva arthaḥ
maṃda agneḥ ati tīkṣṇa bheṣajam iti snigdhasya koṣṭhe mṛdau
dattam śīghram iti prayātam akhilān doṣān na saṃśodhayet
prātar pītam iha auṣadham pariṇatam śodhanam
niśśeṣān atiśodhayet iti matam jaina āgame śāsvate
bhāva arthaḥ
atyaṃta ucchrita saṃcalān ati mahā doṣān haret alpaśas
kṣīṇasya api punar punar pracalitān alpān praśamya ācaret

original: doṣān pakvataraṃ calāniha haret sarvasya sarvātmanā /
analyzed: doṣān pakvataram calān iha haret sarvasya sarva ātmanā
te ca āśu kṣapayaṃti doṣa nicayān niśeṣataḥ nirhṛtāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
yaḥ snigdhā utipibet virecana ghṛtam sthāna cyutān saṃcalāḥ
doṣāḥ sneha vaśāt punar niyamitāḥ svasthāḥ bhavanti sthirāḥ
dudhdūta sva nibaṃdhanāt śithilitāḥ sarve api saukhya āvahāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
evam koṣṭha viśeṣa vid vidita sat koṣṭhasya saṃśodhanam
dadyāt doṣaṃharam tathā hi aviditasya ālokya saumyam mṛdu

original: vīryaṃ yacca manoharaṃ yadapi nirvyāpacca tadbheṣajam // 52 //
analyzed: vīryam yat ca manoharam yat api nirvyāpad ca tat bheṣajam
bhāva arthaḥ
prokte sat vamane virecana vidhau paṃcādaśaḥ vyāpadaḥ
syuḥ tāsām iha lakṣaṇam pratividhānam ca pravakṣyāmahe
vāta ati śūla udbhavaḥ
tyanyā yā parivartikā hṛdaya saṃcāraḥ vibaṃdhaḥ tathā
saṃkhyam lakṣaṇa tad cikitsitam atas vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
rgandhā hṛdyam ati prabhūtam athavā dattam vireka auṣadham
ūrdhvam gacchati doṣa vṛddhiḥ athavā api ati ugra roga uddhatim
tam vāṃtam pariśodhayet atitarām tīkṣṇaiḥ vireka auṣadhaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
syāt yaṃte bamana auṣadham hi adhas gacchati
tatra aniṣṭa phala prasiddham adhikam doṣa ulvaṇam tam punar
su sneha ugratara auṣadhaiḥ atitarām bhūyas tathā vāmayet
bhāva arthaḥ
āma aṃśasya tathā āmavat virasa bībhatsa prabhūte tathā
kṛtvā tad pratipakṣa bheṣaja malam saṃśodhayet ādarāt
riṣṭaiḥ ikṣu rasa anvitaiḥ surabhibhiḥ bhakṣyaiḥ tu saṃyojayet
bhāva arthaḥ
ūrdhva adhas viṣama auṣadham parigatam kiṃcid vyavasthāpayan
śeṣān doṣa gaṇān vinetum asamarthaḥ san mahā doṣa kṛt
mūrccham chardim arocakam tṛṣam atha udgāra aviśuddhim rujām
hṛllāsam kurute tatas hima jalaiḥ ugra anvitaiḥ vāmayet
bhāva arthaḥ
dalpam ca alpa balasya ca pracalita aśeṣa uru doṣasya ca
tatra asamyak adhas virecita narasya uṣṇaiḥ jalaiḥ vāmayet
tīkṣṇa agneḥ api bhakta vat pariṇatam tat ca āśu saṃśodhayet
bhāva arthaḥ

original: alpaṃ cālpaguṇaṃ ca bheṣajamaraṃ pītaṃ na niśśeṣato /
analyzed: alpam ca alpa guṇam ca bheṣajam aram pītam na

bhāva arthaḥ
iti yathā upala balkala kalka saṃvihita kalpam analpam udāhṛtam
vidita cāru śilājatu kalpam api adhikam alpa vikalpa yutam bruve
bhāva arthaḥ
riha śailāḥ grīṣma kāle jalada nala sama rka aṃśu saṃtapta dehāḥ
nija śrṛṃgaiḥ tuga kūṭaiḥ kaṭhinatara samudbhinna sannaddha gaṇḍaiḥ
mada dhārām utsṛjanti trijagat atiśayam sajjate prājya vīryam
bhāva arthaḥ
trapu sīsa ayaḥ su tāmra pravara rajata sat kāṃcanānām ca yonim
niyata asaṃkhyā krameṇa uttaram adhikataram sevyam etat yathāvat
triphalā aṃbu kṣīra sarpiḥ sahitam iha mahā śleṣma pitta anila utthaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
ūṣā api eṣā viśeṣā jatu vat iha bhavet paṃca varṇā suvarṇā
vyāpāre pāradīya upama rasa vara ṣaṭra sarva loha anuvedhī
janayati kanakam tad kṣaṇāt eva sākṣāt
bhāva arthaḥ
vāmyeṣām aviṣām vicārtha viṣa vid saṃbhakṣitām pakṣibhiḥ
saṃbhakṣya akṣaya tām vrajet vilulitām kṣīra ājya sat śarkarām
varjyāḥ nirjita śatruḥ ūrjita guṇaḥ vīrya adhikaḥ syāt naraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
nānā vṛkṣa phala upama ākṛti yutāḥ pāṣāṇa bhedāḥ svayam
jñātvā tān api tad phala aṃbu bahuśas pakvān sucūrṇīkṛtān
kṛtvā kṣīra ghṛta ikṣu jāta sahitān jīrṇe payaḥ sarpiṣā
bhuktvā annam vara śāli jam nija guṇaiḥ martyaḥ maraḥ sya ādaram
bhāva arthaḥ
prakhyāta uttamakoli pākanagarāt gavyūti mātra traye
pūrvasyām diśi kṛṣṇam ekam adhikam bhallāta pāṣāṇakam
staiḥ ca anyaiḥ avagamya sarvam amalam pāṣāṇa cūrṇam haret
tad cūrṇa āḍhakam āḍhakam ghṛtavaram bhallāta taila āḍhakam
pi etad śuddha tanuḥ viśuddha caritaḥ siddhālaye pūjayet

original: droṇaṃ tadvarabheṣajaṃ pratidinaṃ mātrāṃ viditvā kramāt /
analyzed: droṇam tat vara bheṣajam pratidinam mātrām viditvā kramāt
bheṣaja jīrṇa tām api tathā prokta uru veśma sthitaḥ
śālīnām pravara odanam ghṛta payaḥ miśram samaśnan naraḥ
snāna abhyaṃga vilepana ādi kṛta saṃskāre bhavet sarvadā
bhāva arthaḥ
tad roṇam kathita auṣadham su caritaḥ śuddha ātma dehaḥ svayam
līḍhvā gūḍha nivāta veśmāni sukham śayyā tale saṃvasan
nityam satyatama vrataḥ pratidinam
dīrgha āyuḥ balavān jayati atitarām roga iṃdra vṛṃdam naraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
bhallāta upala cūrṇam api abhidditam go kṣīra piṣṭam
rdagdham gomaya vanhinā tribhiḥ iha prāk śuddhitaḥ sarvadā
rjīrṇe cāru rasāyana āhṛti yutaḥ sākṣāt bhavet deva vat
bhāva arthaḥ
pānīyam prapiban vipakvam asakṛt śuddha ātma dehaḥ purā
ṣaṣ māsāt ati durbalaḥ api balavān sthūlaḥ tathā madhyamaḥ
syāt annam varaśāli jam ghṛta payaḥ miśram sadā api āharet
bhāva arthaḥ
snātaḥ snigdha tanuḥ vidhāna vihita āvāsaḥ yathā ukta āhṛtiḥ
bala yutaḥ sākṣāt anaṃga upamaḥ
jīvet varṣa sahasra baṃdhuḥ aṃtaraḥ bhūtvā atigaḥ sarvadā
bhāva arthaḥ
vajrāṇi api atha vajraloham akhilam vajra ūrubaṃdhī phalam
prodyat vajra kapālam api atitaram vajra ākhya pāṣāṇakam

original: yadyallabdhamataḥ pragṛhya vidhinā dagdhvā tu bhastrāgninā /
analyzed: yat yat labdham atas pragṛhya vidhinā dagdhvā tu bhastrā agninā
samyak pāṭala vīravṛkṣa kṛta sat bhasma ambhasi prakṣipet
tāni ati uṣṇa kulattha pakva salile sapta abhivekān kramāt

original: kṛtvaivaṃ punarādhike payasi ca prakṣipya yatnādbudhaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtvā evam punar ādhike payasi ca prakṣipya yatnāt budhaḥ
cūrṇīkṛtya sitā ājya miśram amalam jñātvā atra mātrām svayam
līḍhvā āhāra nivāsa bid sa jayati prakhyāta rogān naraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
ṣaṭ māsān upayujya vajra maya sat bhaiṣajyam ājya anvitam
jīrṇe smin vara bhaiṣajaiḥ ghṛta payaḥ miśra annam api āhṛtam
jīvet varṣa sahasram aṃbaracaraiḥ bhūtvā ati garvaḥ sadā
prodyat yauvana darpa darpita balaḥ sat vajra kāyaḥ naraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
stām kṣīreṇa ghṛtena ca ikṣu rasa saṃyuktena saṃbhakṣayet
akṣuṇṇam balam api avāryam adhikam vīryam ca nīroga tām
vāṃchan abda sahasram āyuḥ anavadya ātmīya veṣaḥ naraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
gośrṛṃgī giriśrṛṃga jām api gṛhītvā āśoṣya saṃcūrṇitām
gavya kṣīra ghṛtaiḥ vipācya guḍa saṃmiśraiḥ prabhakṣya kramāt
paścāt kṣīra ghṛta aśana ukṣaya balam prāpnoti martyaḥ svayam
nirvīryaḥ api ativīryam ūrjita guṇaḥ sākṣāt bhavet niścayaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
bhakṣyān prokta vidhānataḥ pratidinam saṃbhakṣya

original: vīryaṃ prājyavalaṃ vilāsavilasat sadyauvanaṃ prāpya tat /
analyzed: vīryam prājya valam vilāsa vilasat sat yauvanam prāpya tat
ṣaścāt āyuḥ avāpyati tri śatam abdānām niruddha āmayaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
nāgī

original: laṃ saṃcūrṇya ghṛtena miśritamidaṃ līḍhvā sadā nirmalaḥ //
analyzed: laṃ saṃcūrṇya ghṛtena miśritam idam līḍhvā sadā nirmalaḥ
jīvet sahasram naraḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
satkriyāḥ ca vidhinā samyak vidhāsye manāk
varṣābhūḥ pramukhaiḥ viśeṣa vihitaiḥ sat bheṣajaiḥ bhāṣitam
prodyat dyādhi vināśanaiḥ asadṛśaiḥ dṛṣṭaiḥ sa samyak phalaiḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
kṣāraiḥ ikṣuraka ikṣu tāli tila ja apāmārga nirguṃḍikā
svara karṇikā
iti pāṭha antaram
pakvaiḥ bhasma caturguṇa aṃbhasi tatas pāda avaśeṣīkṛtaiḥ
tad pādāmala sat guḍaiḥ paripacet na atidravam phāṇitam
tasmin sa tri kaṭu trijātaka ghanān saṃcūrṇya pāda aṃśataḥ
da tvā miśritam etat ukta kṛta saṃskāre ghaṭe sthāpitam

original: saddhānye kalaśaṃ nidhāya pihitaṃ māsodhdṛtaṃ taṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: sat dhānye kalaśam nidhāya pihitam māsa udhdṛtam tam naraḥ
saṃbhakṣya akṣaya roga vallabha gaṇān jitvā ciram jīvati
bhāva arthaḥ
miśritam su vihitam samyak ghaṭe saṃskṛte
su svādu samasta roga nivaha pradhvaṃsi saukhya āspadam
evam citraka sat rasāyana varam pītvā naraḥ saṃtatam
yakṣmāṇam kṣapayet anūna balam ati arśāṃsi sarvān gadān
bhāva arthaḥ
nyukta anyukta kaṣāya pāka vidhinā kṛtvā niṣevya āturaḥ
jīvet varṣa śata trayam nikhila roga eka pramāthī svayam
nirvīryaḥ api ati vīrya dhairya sahitaḥ sākṣāt anaṃga upamaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
iti evam vividha vikalpa kalpa yogam śāstra ukta krama vidhinā niṣevya martyaḥ
prāpnoti prakaṭa balam pratāpam āyuḥ vīryam ca apratihata tām nirāmaya tvam
bhāva arthaḥ
pratyakṣa prakaṭa phala prasiddha yogān siddhāṃta udhdṛta nija buddhibhiḥ praṇītān

original: budhvaivaṃ vidhivadiha prayujya yatnāddurvāryākhilaripavo bhavaṃti martyāḥ // 47 //
analyzed: budhvā evam vidhivat iha prayujya yatnāt durvārya akhila ripavaḥ bhavanti martyāḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
iti tat hitam rasa rasāyanakam parama auṣadhāni alam
śāstra vihita vidhinā atra narāḥ samupetya nitya sukhinaḥ bhavaṃti te
atha ca ukta yukta vidhinā atra sat asat vastu vedinā satyam iti
kim uta saṃkathanīyam aśeṣam asti satatam niṣevyatām
bhāva arthaḥ
nagarī yathā nagaram ātma parikara samasta sādhanaiḥ
rakṣati ca ripu bhayāt tanūnām tanu mukta bheṣaja gaṇaiḥ tathā āmayāt
idam auṣadha ācaraṇam atra sukṛtī jana yogyam anyathā
dharma sukha nilaya deha gaṇaḥ pralayam prayāti bahu doṣa dūṣitaḥ  /
bhāva arthaḥ
iti evam vividha auṣadhāni alam
bhāva arthaḥ
saṃlālita aṃghri yugalaḥ sakala āgama jñaḥ
ālāpanīya guṇa sa unnata
śrī naṃdi naṃdita guruḥ guruḥ ūrjitaḥ ūham
bhāva arthaḥ
tasya ājñayā vividha bheṣaja dāna sidhyai
sat vaidya vatsala tapaḥ paripūraṇa artham
śāstram kṛtam jina mata udhdṛtam etat udyat
kalyāṇa kārakam iti prathitam dharāyām
bhāva arthaḥ
iti etat uttaram anuttaram uttama jñaiḥ vistīrṇa vastu yutam asta samasta doṣam
prāk bhāṣitam jina varaiḥ adhunā muni iṃdra ugra āditya paṇḍita mahā gurubhiḥ praṇītam
bhāva arthaḥ
prāṇāvāya mahā āgamāt avitatham saṃgṛhya saṃkṣepataḥ
ugra āditya guruḥ guruḥ guru guṇaiḥ udbhāsi saukhya āspadam
śāstram saṃskṛta bhāṣayā racitavān iti eṣa bhedaḥ tayoḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
sa alaṃkāram su śabdam śravaṇa sukham atha prārthitam sva artha vidbhiḥ
prāṇa āyuḥ satva vīrya prakaṭa bala karam prāṇinām svastha hetum
nidhi udbhūtam vicāra kṣamam iti kuśalāḥ śāstram etat yathāvat
kalyāṇa ākhyam jineṃdraiḥ viracitam adhigamya āśu saukhyam labhaṃte
bhāva arthaḥ
rvṛttaiḥ saṃcaritaiḥ iha adhika mahā vṛttaiḥ jineṃdra uditaiḥ
saukhya āspadam prāṇinām
bhāva arthaḥ
iti jina vaktra nirgata su śāstra mahā aṃbunidheḥ
sakala padārtha vistṛta taraṃga kula ākulataḥ
nisṛtam idam hi śīkara nibham jagat eka hitam
bhāva arthaḥ

original: ariṣṭhanemiṃ parameṣṭhinaṃ jinaṃ praṇamya bhaktyā pravinaṣṭakalmaṣaṃ /
analyzed: ariṣṭhanemim parameṣṭhinam jinam praṇamya bhaktyā pravinaṣṭa kalmaṣam
viśiṣṭa saṃdiṣṭa su riṣṭa lakṣaṇam pravakṣyate svastha janeṣu bhāṣitam
bhāva arthaḥ
rahasyam etat parama āgama āgatam mahā munīnām parama artha vedinām
nigadyate riṣṭam idam su bhāvanā parātmanām eva na mohita ātmanām
bhāva arthaḥ
mṛtiḥ mṛteḥ lakṣaṇam āyuṣa kṣayam mṛteḥ upāyāt garale kathaṃcana

original: vimohitānāṃ maraṇaṃ mahadbhayaṃ bravīmi cettadyataḥ kasya no bhavet // 3 //
analyzed: vimohitānām maraṇam mahat bhayam bravīmi ced tat yatas kasya naḥ bhavet  /
bhāva arthaḥ

original: atha prayatnādiha riṣṭalakṣaṇaṃ subhāvitānāṃ pravade mahātmanāṃ /
analyzed: atha prayatnāt iha riṣṭa lakṣaṇam su bhāvitānām pravade mahātmanām
kaṭaṃkaṭī bhūta vayaḥ dhikeṣu api pratīta mṛtyoḥ bhayam eva sarvadā
bhāva arthaḥ
jarā rujā mṛtyu bhayena bhāvitāḥ bhava aṃtareṣu apratibuddha dehinaḥ

original: yataśca te bibhyati mṛtyubhītitastato na teṣāṃ maraṇaṃ vadediha // 5 //
analyzed: yatas ca te bibhyati mṛtyu bhītitaḥ tatas na teṣām maraṇam vadet iha
bhāva arthaḥ
vibhīta cittāḥ khalu sāra vastu te
samasta saukhya āspada mukti kāṃkṣiṇaḥ sukhena śruṇvaṃtu nigadyate adhunā
bhāva arthaḥ
yat eva sarvam viparīta lakṣaṇam sva pūrva śīta prakṛti svabhāvataḥ

original: tadeva riṣṭaṃ pratipāditaṃ jinairataḥparaṃ spaṣṭataraṃ pravakṣyate // 7 //
analyzed: tat eva riṣṭam pratipāditam jinaiḥ atas param spaṣṭataram pravakṣyate
bhāva arthaḥ
yat eva caṃdra arka su maṇḍalam mahī tri khaṇḍam ākhaṇḍala kārmuka chavi

original: prabhāti sacchidrasametameva vā sa jīvatītthaṃ khalu vatsaradvayaṃ // 8 //
analyzed: prabhāti sa chidra sametam eva vā sa jīvati ittham khalu vatsara dvayam
bhāva arthaḥ

original: yadarddhacaṃdrepi ca maṇḍalaprabhāṃ dhruvaṃ ca tārāmathavāpyarundhatīm /
analyzed: yat arddhacaṃdre pi ca maṇḍala prabhām dhruvam ca tārām athavā api arundhatīm

original: marutpathaṃ caṃdrakaraṃ divātapaṃ na caiva paśyennahi so'pi vatsarāt // 9 //
analyzed: marut patham caṃdrakaram divā ātapam na ca eva paśyet na hi saḥ api vatsarāt
bhāva arthaḥ
sphurat prabhā bhāsuram iṃdu maṇḍalam nirasta tejaḥ nikaram divākaram

original: ya eva paśyanmanujaḥ kadācana prayāti caikādaśamāsato divam // 10 //
analyzed: yaḥ eva paśyan manujaḥ kadācana prayāti ca ekādaśa māsataḥ divam
bhāva arthaḥ
prapaśyati chardi kapha ātma mūtra sat purīpa retaḥ sura cāpa sat prabham

original: suvarṇatārācchavisupta eva vā prabuddha evaṃ daśamānsa jīvati // 11 //
analyzed: suvarṇa tārā chavi suptaḥ eva vā prabuddhaḥ evam daśamān sa jīvati  /
bhāva arthaḥ
suvarṇa vṛkṣam sura lokam āgatam mṛtān piśācān atha bāṃbare pure
pradṛśya jīvet nava māsam adbhutān pralaṃbamā na anadhikān natān narān
bhāva arthaḥ
akāraṇāt sthūlataraḥ na rocirāt akāraṇāt eva kṛśaḥ svayam bhavet
akāraṇāt vā prakṛtiḥ vikāriṇī sa jīvati iha aṣṭa viśiṣṭa māsakān
bhāva arthaḥ

original: yadagrato vāpyathavāpi pṛṣṭataḥ padaṃ sakhaṇḍatvamupauti kardame /
analyzed: yat agratas vā api athavā api pṛṣṭatas padam sa khaṇḍa tvam upauti kardame

original: sapāṃśulepaḥ svayamādra eva vā sa saptamāsānnaparaṃ sa jīvati // 14 //
analyzed: sa pāṃśulepaḥ eva vā sa sapta māsān na param sa jīvati
bhāva arthaḥ
ulūka kākoddhata gṛdhdra kauśika aviśiṣṭa kaṃga ugra supiṃgala ādayaḥ

original: śirasyatikrāmya vasaṃti cedbalāt sa ṣaṭsu māseṣu vinaśyati dhruvam // 15 //
analyzed: śirasi atikrāmya vasanti ced balāt sa ṣaṭsu māseṣu vinaśyati dhruvam
bhāva arthaḥ
sa pāṃśu toyena su pāṃśunā api aram śirasi asākṣāt avamṛdyate svayam
naraḥ vinaśyati atha paṃca māsataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
yat abhra hīne api viyati anūna sat vilola vidyut prabhayā prapaśyati
yamasya diś bhāga gatam niraṃtaram prayāti asau māsa catuṣṭayāt divam
bhāva arthaḥ

original: yadā na paśyatyavalokya cātmanastanuṃ prasupte mahiṣoṣṭragarddabhān /
analyzed: yadā na paśyati avalokya ca ātmanaḥ tanum prasupte mahiṣa uṣṭra garddabhān

original: pravāturāruhya divā ca vāyasairmṛto'pi māsatrayameva jīvati // 18 //
analyzed: pravātuḥ āruhya divā ca vāyasaiḥ mṛtaḥ api māsa trayam eva jīvati
bhāva arthaḥ
sureṃdra cāpam jala madhya saṃsthitam pradṛśya sākṣāt kṣaṇa mātratas calam
vicārya māsa dvaya jīvitaḥ svayam parityajet ātma parigraham budhaḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
yadā alakā darśana caṃdra bhāskara pradīpta tejaḥ su naraḥ na paśyati

original: samakṣamātraṃ pratibiṃbamanyathā vilokayedvā sa ca māsamātrataḥ // 20 //
analyzed: samakṣa mātram pratibiṃbam anyathā vilokayet vā sa ca māsa mātrataḥ
bhāva arthaḥ

original: yadā parasminniha dṛṣṭimaṇḍale svayaṃ svarūpaṃ na ca paśyati sphuṭaṃ /
analyzed: yadā parasmin iha dṛṣṭi maṇḍale svayam sva rūpam na ca paśyati sphuṭam

original: pradīptagaṃdhaṃ ca na vetti yastata tripaṃcarātreṣu naro na vidyate // 21 //
analyzed: pradīpta gaṃdham ca na vetti yaḥ tata tri paṃca rātreṣu naraḥ na vidyate
bhāva arthaḥ

original: yadā śarīraṃ śavagaṃdhatāṃ vadedakāraṇādeva vadaṃti vedanā /
analyzed: yadā śarīram śava gaṃdha tām vadet akāraṇāt eva vadaṃti vedanā

original: prabuddha vā svapnatayaiva yo naraiḥ sa jīvati dvādaśarātrameva vā // 22 //
analyzed: vā svapna tayā eva yaḥ naraiḥ sa jīvati dvādaśa rātram eva vā
bhāva arthaḥ
bhavet yadā araviṃdam sama vaktra maṇḍalam

original: yadā kapole balakeṃdragopakassa eva jīvediha saptarātrikaṃ // 23 //
analyzed: yadā kapole balaka iṃdra gopakaḥ saḥ eva jīvet iha sapta rātrikam
bhāva arthaḥ

original: tudaṃ śarīre pratipīḍayatyapyanūnamarmāṇi ca māruto yadā /
analyzed: tudam śarīre pratipīḍayati api anūna marmāṇi ca mārutaḥ yadā
tathā ugra durvṛścika viddha vat naraḥ sadā eva duḥkhī tri dinam sa jīvati
bhāva arthaḥ
jalaiḥ su śītaiḥ hima śītala upamaiḥ prasicyataḥ yasya na roma hargaḥ

original: na vetti yassarvaśarīrasatkriyāṃ naro na jīveddvidinātparaṃ saḥ // 25 //
analyzed: na vetti yaḥ sarva śarīra satkriyām naraḥ na jīvet dvi dināt param saḥ
bhāva arthaḥ
śruṇoti yopī iva samudra ghoṣam api apāṃga gam jyotiḥ ati prayatnataḥ

original: yathā na paśyedathavā na nāsikā naraśca jīveddivasaṃ na cāparam // 25 //
analyzed: yathā na paśyet athavā na nāsikāḥ naraḥ ca jīvet divasam na ca aparam
bhāva arthaḥ
pādam jaṃghām sva jānu ūru kaṭi kukṣi galān tu alam
śiraḥ ca kramataḥ yadā
na paśyet ātmanacchāyām kramāt tri dvi eka vatsaram
māsān daśa tathā sapta catuḥ ekān sa jīvati
tathā dināni eka adhikāni api
jīvet iti naraḥ matvā tyajet ātma parigraham
bhāva arthaḥ

original: bhrūyugmaṃ navavāsaraṃ śravaṇayoḥ ghoṣaṃ ca saptānhikaṃ /
analyzed: bhrū yugmam nava vāsaram śravaṇayoḥ ghoṣam ca sapta ānhikam
paṃca dina ādibhiḥ nayanayoḥ jyotiḥ dinānām trayam
